GE07bhg4c07u:2: mayy āsakta-manāḥ pārtha yogaṃ yuñjan mad-āśrayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:3: asaṃśayaṃ samagraṃ māṃ yathā jñāsyasi tac chṛṇu //1//
GE07bhg4c07u:7: pūrvādhyāyānte mad-gatenāntarātmanā yo māṃ bhajate sa me yuktatamo mataḥ ity uktam /
GE07bhg4c07u:8: atra kīdṛśas tvaṃ yasya bhaktiḥ kartavyety apekṣāyāṃ sva-svarūpaṃ nirupayiṣyan śrī-bhagavān uvāca mayīti /
GE07bhg4c07u:9: mayi parameśvara āsaktam abhiniviṣṭaṃ mano yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:12: yogaṃ yuñjann abhyasan asaṃśayaṃ yathā bhavaty evam /
GE07bhg4c07u:13: māṃ samagraṃ vibhūti-balaiśvaryādi-sahitaṃ yathā jñāsyasi tad idaṃ mayā vakṣyamāṇaṃ śṛṇu //1//
GE07bhg4c07u:15: yad-bhaktiṃ na vinā muktir yaḥ sevyaḥ sarva-yoginām /
GE07bhg4c07u:18: sa-yogaṃ vyākhyāyādhunā dhyeya-brahma-pratipādana-pradhānena madhyamena ṣaṭkena tat-padārtho
GE07bhg4c07u:21: śraddhāvān bhajate yo māṃ sa me yuktatamo mataḥ // [Gītā 6.47]
GE07bhg4c07u:22: iti prāg-uktasya bhagavad-bhajanasya vyākhyānāya saptamo 'dhyāya ārabhyate /
GE07bhg4c07u:23: tatra kīdṛśaṃ bhagavato rūpaṃ bhajanīyaṃ kathaṃ vā tad-gato 'ntarātmā syād ity etad-dvayaṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:24: praṣṭavyam arjunenāpṛṣṭam api parama-kāruṇikatayā svayam eva vivakṣuḥ śrī-bhagavān uvāca mayīti /
GE07bhg4c07u:25: mayi parameśvare sakala-jagad-āyatanatvādivividha-vibhūti-bhāgini āsaktaṃ viṣayāntara-parihāreṇa sarvadā niviṣṭaṃ mano yasya tava sa tvam /
GE07bhg4c07u:27: rājāśrayo bhāryādy-āsakta-manāś ca rāja-bhṛtyaḥ prasiddho mumukṣus tu mad-āśrayo mad-āsakta-manāś ca /
GE07bhg4c07u:28: tvaṃ tvad-vidho vā yogaṃ yuñjan manaḥ-samādhānaṃ ṣaṣṭhokta-prakāreṇa kurvan /
GE07bhg4c07u:29: asaṃśayaṃ yathā bhavaty evaṃ samagraṃ sarva-vibhūti-bala-śaktyaiśvaryādi-sampannaṃ māṃ yathā yena prakāreṇa jñāsyasi tac chṛṇūcyamānaṃ mayā
GE07bhg4c07u:36: na bhajante bhajante ye te cāpy uktāś caturvidhāḥ //
GE07bhg4c07u:39: ca sālokyādi-sādhakas tathā sarva-mukhyaḥ karma-jñānādi-nirapekṣa eva premavat pārṣadatva-lakṣaṇa-mukti-phala-sādhakas
GE07bhg4c07u:40: tathā yat karmabhir yat tapasā jñāna-vairāgyataś ca yat ity ādau,
GE07bhg4c07u:42: svargāpavargaṃ mad-dhāma [BhP 1.20.32-33] ity ādy-ukter vināpi sādhanānantaraṃ svargāpavargādi-nikhila-sādhakaś
GE07bhg4c07u:43: ca paramaḥ svatantraḥ sarva-sukaro 'pi sarva-duṣkaraḥ śrīmad-bhakti-yoga ucyate /
GE07bhg4c07u:44: nanu tam eva viditvā atimṛtyum eti [ŚvetU 6.15] iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:45: jñānaṃ vinā kevalayā bhaktyaiva kathaṃ mokṣaḥ brūṣe ?
GE07bhg4c07u:46: maivaṃ, tvam eva tat padārthaṃ paramātmānam eva viditvā sākṣād anubhūya,
GE07bhg4c07u:47: na tu tvaṃ-padārthaṃ ātmānaṃ nāpi prakṛtiṃ nāpi vastu-mātraṃ viditvā mṛtyum atyeti ity asyāḥ śruter arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:48: tatra sita-śarkarā-rasa-grahaṇe yathā rasanaiva kāraṇaṃ na tu cakṣuḥ-śrotrādikaṃ tathaiva guṇātītasya brahmaṇe grahaṇaṃ sambhavet,
GE07bhg4c07u:50: bhaktyāham ekayā grāhyaḥ [BhP 11.14.11] iti bhagavad-ukter iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:51: bhaktyā mām abhijānāti yāvān yaś cāsmi tattvataḥ [Gītā 18.55] ity atra sa-viśeṣaṃ pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:55: kiṃ ca, asyāṃ śrutau viditvā ity anantaram eva-kārasyāprayogād eva /
GE07bhg4c07u:57: tasmād eva paramātmano viditāt kvacid aviditād api mokṣa ity artho labhyate /
GE07bhg4c07u:58: tataś ca bhakty-utthena nirguṇena paramātma-jñānena mokṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:59: kvacit tu bhakty-utthaṃ taj-jñānaṃ vināpi kevalena bhakti-mātreṇa mokṣa ity arthaḥ paryavasyati /
GE07bhg4c07u:60: yathā matsyaṇḍikā-piṇḍād rasanā-doṣeṇālabdha-svādād api bhuktāt tad-eka-nāśyo vyādhir naśyaty evātra na sandehaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:61: matsyaṇḍikāni te khaṇḍa-vikārā śarkarāsite ity amaraḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:65: ekādaśe 'py uktaṃ - yat karmabhir yat tapasā jñāna-vairāgyataś ca yat ity ādau sarvaṃ mad-bhakti-yogena mad-bhakto labhate 'ñjasā [BhP 11.20.31-32] iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:66: ataeva yan-nāma-sakṛc-chravaṇāt pukkaso 'pi vimucyate saṃsārāt ity ādau bahuśo vākyair bhaktyaiva mokṣaḥ pratipādyata iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:69: śraddhāvān bhajate yo māṃ sa me yuktatamo mataḥ // [Gītā 6.47]
GE07bhg4c07u:70: iti tvad-vākyena tvan-manaskatve sati tvaj-jana-viṣayaka-śraddhāvattvam iti tvayā sva-bhakta-viśeṣa-lakṣaṇam eva kṛtam ity avagamyate /
GE07bhg4c07u:71: kintu sa ca kīdṛśo bhaktas tadīya-jñāna-vijñānayor adhikārī bhavatīty apekṣāyām āha mayy āsakteti dvābhyām / yadyapi -
GE07bhg4c07u:76: ity ukter bhajan-prakramata eva mad-anubhava-kramo 'pi bhavati,
GE07bhg4c07u:77: tad apy eka-grāsa-mātra-bhojinas tathā tuṣṭi-puṣṭī na spaṣṭe bhavataḥ,
GE07bhg4c07u:79: tathaiva mayi śyāmasundare pītāmbare āsaktam āsakti-bhūmikārūḍhaṃ mano yasya tathābhūta eva tvaṃ māṃ jñāsyasi /
GE07bhg4c07u:81: tat śṛṇu kīdṛśaṃ yogaṃ mayā saha saṃyogaṃ yuñjan śanaiḥ śanaiḥ prāpnuvan mad-āśrayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:82: mām eva, na tu jñāna-karmādikam āśrayamāṇo 'nanya-bhakta ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:85: avyaktā hi gatir duḥkhaṃ dehavadbhir avāpyate // [Gītā 12.5]
GE07bhg4c07u:87: tathā jñāninām upāsyaṃ yad brahma parama-mahato mama mahima-svarūpam eva /
GE07bhg4c07u:88: yad uktaṃ mayaiva satyavrataṃ prati matsya-rūpeṇa -
GE07bhg4c07u:89: madīyaṃ mahimānaṃ ca paraṃ brahmeti śabditam /
GE07bhg4c07u:90: vetsyasy anugṛhītaṃ me sampraśnair vivṛtaṃ hṛdi // [BhP 8.24.38] iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:96: ādyena ṣaṭkenopāsakasya jīvasya svarūpaṃ tat-prāpti-sādhanaṃ ca prādhānyenoktam /
GE07bhg4c07u:97: madhyena tūpāsyasya svasya tat tac ca tathocyate /
GE07bhg4c07u:98: tatra ṣaṣṭhānta-nirdiṣṭaṃ tava bhajanīyaṃ rūpaṃ kīdṛśaṃ,
GE07bhg4c07u:99: kathaṃ vā bhajato 'ntarātmā tad-gataḥ syād ity etat pārthenāpṛṣṭam api kṛpālutvena svayam eva vivakṣur bhagavān uvāca mayīti /
GE07bhg4c07u:100: vyākhyāta-lakṣaṇe svopāsye mayy āsaktam atimātra-nirataṃ mano yasya sa tvam anyo
GE07bhg4c07u:101: vā tādṛśo mad-āśrayo mad-dāsya-sakhy-ādy-ekatamena bhāvena māṃ śaraṇaṃ gato yogaṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:104: kṛṣṇa eva paraṃ tattvam ato 'nyad veti sandeha-śūnyo mat-pāramya-niścayavān ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:105: samagraṃ sādhiṣṭhānaṃ savibhūtiṃ saparikaraṃ ca māṃ sarveśvaraṃ yena jñānena jñāsyasi
GE07bhg4c07u:108: na ca samagram iti kārtsnyena sa jñānam ādiśatīti vācyam anantasya tasya tathājñānāsambhavāt /
GE07bhg4c07u:109: smṛtiś ca kārtsnyena nājo 'py abhidhātum īśaḥ iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:111: jñānaṃ te 'haṃ sa-vijñānam idaṃ vakṣyāmy aśeṣataḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:112: yaj jñātvā neha bhūyo 'nyaj jñātavyam avaśiṣyate //2//
GE07bhg4c07u:113: śrīdharaḥ - vakṣyamāṇaṃ jñānaṃ stauti jñānam iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:115: tat-sahitam idaṃ mad-viṣayam aśeṣataḥ sākalyena vakṣyāmi /
GE07bhg4c07u:116: yaj jñātveha śreyo-mārge vartamānasya punar anyaj jñātavyam avaśiṣṭaṃ na bhavati /
GE07bhg4c07u:118: madhusūdanaḥ - jñāsyasīty ukte parokṣam eva taj jñānaṃ syād iti śaṅkāṃ vyāvartayan stauti śrotur ābhimukhyāya jñānam iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:120: asambhāvanādi-pratibandhena phalam ajanayat parokṣam ity upacaryate asambhāvanādi-nirāse
GE07bhg4c07u:121: tu vicāra-paripākānte tenaiva pramāṇena janitaṃ jñānaṃ pratibandhābhāvāt phalaṃ janayad-aparokṣam ity ucyate /
GE07bhg4c07u:123: tena vijñānena sahitam idam aparokṣam eva jñānaṃ śāstra-janyaṃ te tubhyam ahaṃ param āpto vakṣyāmy aśeṣataḥ sādhana-phalādi-sahitatvena niravaśeṣaṃ kathayiṣyāmi /
GE07bhg4c07u:124: śrautīm eka-vijñānena sarva-vijñāna-pratijñām anusarann āha yaj-jñānaṃ nitya-caitanya-rūpaṃ jñātvā vedānta-janya-mano-vṛtti-viṣayīkṛtyeha vyavahāra-bhūmau bhūyaḥ punar api anyat
GE07bhg4c07u:126: sarvādhiṣṭhāna-san-mātra-jñānena kalpitānāṃ sarveṣāṃ bādhe san-mātra-pariśeṣāt tan-mātra-jñānenaiva tvaṃ kṛtārtho bhaviṣyasīty abhiprāyaḥ //2//
GE07bhg4c07u:127: viśvanāthaḥ - tatra mad-bhakter āsakti-bhūmikātaḥ pūrvam api me jñānam aiśvarya-mayaṃ bhavet /
GE07bhg4c07u:129: tad-ubhayam api tvaṃ śṛṇv ity āha jñānam iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:130: anyaj jñātavyaṃ nāviśiṣyate iti man-nirviśeṣa-brahma-jñāna-vijñāne 'py etad-antarbhūta evety arthaḥ //2//
GE07bhg4c07u:131: baladevaḥ -- vakṣyamāṇaṃ jñānaṃ stauti jñānam iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:134: tac-chakti-dvaya-vivikta-svarūpa-viṣayakaṃ jñānaṃ vijñānaṃ tena sahitaṃ te tubhyaṃ prapannāyāśeṣataḥ sāmagryeṇopadekṣyāmīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:135: yat svarūpaṃ sarva-kāraṇaṃ yac ca dhyeyaṃ tad ubhaya-viṣayakaṃ jñānam atra vaktuṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:136: pratijñātaṃ yaj jñānaṃ jñātveha śreyo-vartmani niviṣṭasya jijñāsos tavānyaj jñātavyaṃ nāvaśiṣyate /
GE07bhg4c07u:139: manuṣyāṇāṃ sahasreṣu kaś cid yatati siddhaye /
GE07bhg4c07u:140: yatatām api siddhānāṃ kaś cin māṃ vetti tattvataḥ //3//
GE07bhg4c07u:141: śrīdharaḥ - mad-bhaktiṃ vinā tu yaj jñānaṃ durlabham ity āha manuṣyāṇām iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:142: asaṅkhyātānāṃ jīvānāṃ madhye manuṣya-vyatiriktānāṃ śreyasi pravṛttir eva nāsti /
GE07bhg4c07u:143: manuṣyāṇāṃ tu sahasreṣu madhye kaścid eva puṇya-vaśāt siddhaya ātma-jñānāya prayatate /
GE07bhg4c07u:144: prayatnaṃ kurvatām api sahasreṣu kaścid eva prakṛṣṭa-puṇya-vaśād ātmānaṃ vetti /
GE07bhg4c07u:145: tādṛśānāṃ cātma-jñānāṃ sahasreṣu kaścid eva māṃ paramātmānaṃ mat-prasādena tattvato vetti /
GE07bhg4c07u:146: tad evam atidurlabham api yaj jñānaṃ tubhyam ahaṃ vakṣyāmīty arthaḥ //3//
GE07bhg4c07u:147: madhusūdanaḥ - atidurlabhaṃ caitan-mad-anugraham antareṇa mahā-phalaṃ jñānam /
GE07bhg4c07u:149: manuṣyāṇāṃ śāstrīya-jñāna-karma-yogyānāṃ sahasreṣu madhye kaścid eko 'neka-janma-kṛta-sukṛta-samāsādita-nityānitya-vastu-vivekaḥ
GE07bhg4c07u:150: san yatati yatate siddhaye sattva-śuddhi-dvārā jñānotpattaye /
GE07bhg4c07u:151: yatatāṃ yatamānānāṃ jñānāya siddhānāṃ prāg-arjita-sukṛtānāṃ sādhakānām api madhye
GE07bhg4c07u:152: kaścid ekaḥ śravaṇa-manana-nididhyāsana-paripākānte mām īśvaraṃ vetti sākṣātkaroti
GE07bhg4c07u:155: sādhanānuṣṭhāyiṣv api madhye phala-bhāgī parama-durlabha iti kiṃ vaktavyam asya jñānasya māhātmyam ity abhiprāyaḥ //3//
GE07bhg4c07u:156: viśvanāthaḥ - etac ca sa-vijñānaṃ maj-jñānaṃ pūrvam adhyāya-ṣaṭke prokta-lakṣaṇair jñānibhir yogibhir api durlabham iti vadana prathamaṃ vijñānam āha manuṣyāṇām iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:157: asaṅkhyātānāṃ jīvānāṃ madhye kaścid eve manuṣyo bhavati /
GE07bhg4c07u:158: manuṣyāṇāṃ sahasreṣu madhye kaścid eva śreyase yatate /
GE07bhg4c07u:159: tādṛśānām api manuṣyāṇāṃ sahasreṣu kaścid eva māṃ śyāmasundarākāraṃ tattvato vetti
GE07bhg4c07u:162: baladevaḥ - sva-jñānasya daurlabhyam āha manuṣyāṇām iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:163: uccāvaca-dheātma-asaṅkhyātā jīvās teṣu katicid eva manuṣyās teṣāṃ śāstrādhikāra-yogyānāṃ sahasreṣu madhye kaścid eva sat-prasaṅga-vaśāt siddhaye sva-parātmāvalokanāya yatate,
GE07bhg4c07u:165: tādṛśānāṃ yatatāṃ yatamānānāṃ siddhānāṃ labdha-sva-parātmāvalokanānāṃ sahasreṣu madhye kaścid evaiko māṃ kṛṣṇaṃ tattvato vetti /
GE07bhg4c07u:166: ayam arthaḥ - śāstrīyārthānuṣṭhāyino bahavo manuṣyāḥ paramāṇu-caitanyaṃ svātmānaṃ prādeśa-mātraṃ mat-svāṃśaṃ paramātmānaṃ cānubhūya vimucyante
GE07bhg4c07u:167: māṃ tu yaśodā-stanandhayaṃ kṛṣṇam adhunā tvat-sārathiṃ kaścid eva tādṛśa-sat-prasaṅgāvāpta-mad-bhaktis tattvato yāthātmyena vetti /
GE07bhg4c07u:171: māṃ tu veda na kaścana [Gītā 7.26] iti //3//
GE07bhg4c07u:173: bhūmir āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ khaṃ mano buddhir eva ca /
GE07bhg4c07u:174: ahaṃkāra itīyaṃ me bhinnā prakṛtir aṣṭadhā //4//
GE07bhg4c07u:175: śrīdharaḥ - evaṃ śrotāram abhimukhīkṛtyedānīṃ prakṛti-dvārā sṛṣṭy-ādi-kartṛtveneśvara-tattvaṃ pratijñātaṃ nirūpayiṣyan parāpara-bhedena prakṛti-dvayam āha bhūmir iti dvyābhyām /
GE07bhg4c07u:178: buddhi-śabdena tat-kāraṇaṃ mahat-tattvam ahaṅkāra-śabdena tat-kāraṇam avidyā /
GE07bhg4c07u:180: yad vā bhūmy-ādi-śabdaiḥ pañca-mahā-bhūtāni sūkṣmaiḥ sahikīkṛtya gṛhyante /
GE07bhg4c07u:183: manaḥ-śabdena tu manasaivonneyam avyakta-rūpaṃ pradhānam iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:184: anena prakāreṇa me pakṛtir māyākhyā śaktir aṣṭadhā bhinnā vibhāgaṃ prāptā /
GE07bhg4c07u:187: tathā ca kṣetrādhyāya imām eva prakṛtiṃ caturviṃśati-tattvātmanā prapañcayiṣyati -
GE07bhg4c07u:188: mahābhūtāny ahaṅkāro buddhir avyaktam eva ca /
GE07bhg4c07u:189: indriyāṇi daśaikaṃ ca pañca cendriya-gocarāḥ // [Gītā 13.5] iti //4//
GE07bhg4c07u:190: madhusūdanaḥ - evaṃ prarocanena śrotāram abhimukhīkṛtyātmanaḥ sarvātmakatvena paripūrṇatvam avatārayann ādāv aparāṃ prakṛtim upanyasyati bhūmir iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:191: sāṅkhyair hi pañca tan-mātrāṇy ahaṅkāro mahān avyaktam ity aṣṭau prakṛtayaḥ pañca
GE07bhg4c07u:192: mahā-bhūtāni pañca karmendriyāṇi pañca jñānendriyāṇi ubhaya-sādhāraṇaṃ manaś ceti
GE07bhg4c07u:195: tatra bhūmir āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ kham iti pṛthvy-ap-tejo-vāyv-ākāśākhya-pañca-mahābhūta-sūkṣmāvasthā-rūpāṇi gandha-rasa-rūpa-sparśa-śabdātmakāni pañca-tan-mātrāṇi lakṣyante /
GE07bhg4c07u:197: manaḥ-śabdena ca pariśiṣṭam avyaktaṃ lakṣyante prakṛti-śabda-sāmānādhikaraṇyena svārtha-hāner āvaśyakatvāt /
GE07bhg4c07u:198: manaḥ-śabdena vā sva-kāraṇam ahaṅkāro lakṣyate pañca-tanmātra-saṃnikarṣāt /
GE07bhg4c07u:199: buddhi-śabdas tv ahaṅkāra-kāraṇe mahat-tattve mukhya-vṛttir eva /
GE07bhg4c07u:200: ahaṅkāra-śabdena ca sarva-vāsanā-vāsitam avidyātmakam avyaktaṃ lakṣyante pravartakatvādy-asādhāraṇa-dharma-yogāc ca /
GE07bhg4c07u:201: iti ukta-prakāreṇeyam aparokṣā sākṣi-bhāsyatvāt prakṛtir māyākhyā pārameśvarī śaktir anirvacanīya-svabhāvā triguṇātmikāṣṭadhā bhinno 'ṣṭabhiḥ prakārair bhedam āgatā /
GE07bhg4c07u:205: viśvanāthaḥ -atha bhakti-mate jñānaṃ nāma bhagavad-aiśvarya-jñānam eva,
GE07bhg4c07u:207: ataḥ svīyaiśvarya-jñānaṃ nirūpayan parāpara-bhedena svīya-prakṛti-dvayam āha bhūmir iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c07u:208: bhūmy-ādi-śabdaiḥ pañca-mahā-bhūtāni sūkṣma-bhūtair gandhādibhiḥ sahaikīkṛtya saṅgṛhyante,
GE07bhg4c07u:211: baladevaḥ - evaṃ śrotāraṃ pārtham abhimukhīkṛtya svasya kāraṇa-svarūpaṃ cid-acic-chaktimad vaktuṃ te śaktī prāha bhūmir iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c07u:212: caturviṃśatidhā prakṛtir bhūmy-ādy-ātmanāṣṭadhā bhinnā me madīyā bodhyā tan-mātrādīnāṃ bhūmy-ādiṣv antarbhāvād ihāpi caturviṃśatidhaivāvaseyā
GE07bhg4c07u:213: tatra bhūmy-ādiṣu pañcasu bhūteṣu tat-kāraṇānāṃ gandhānāṃ pañcānāṃ tan-mātrāṇām antar-bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:216: manaḥ-śabdas tu mano-gamyam avyakta-rūpaṃ pradhānam iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:217: śrutiś caivam āha-caturviṃśati-saṅkhyānām avyaktaṃ vyaktam ucyate iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:218: svayaṃ ca kṣetrādhyāye vakṣyati mahābhūtāny ahaṅkāraḥ [Gītā 13.5] ity ādinā //4//
GE07bhg4c07u:220: apareyam itas tv anyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parām /
GE07bhg4c07u:222: śrīdharaḥ - aparām imāṃ prakṛtim upasaṃharan parāṃ prakṛtim āha apareyam iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:223: aṣṭadhā yā prakṛtir ukteyam aparā nikṛṣṭā jaḍatvāt parārthatvāc ca /
GE07bhg4c07u:224: itaḥ sakāśāt parāṃ prakṛṣṭām anyāṃ jīva-bhūtāṃ jīva-svarūpāṃ me prakṛtiṃ viddhi jānīhi /
GE07bhg4c07u:225: paratve hetuḥ yayā cetanayā kṣetrajña-rūpayā svakarma-dvāreṇedaṃ jagad dhāryate //5//
GE07bhg4c07u:226: madhusūdanaḥ - evaṃ kṣetra-lakṣaṇāyāḥ prakṛter aparatvaṃ vadan kṣetrajña-lakṣaṇāṃ parāṃ prakṛtim āha apareyam iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:227: yā prāg aṣṭadhoktā prakṛtiḥ sarvācetana-varga-rūpā seyam aparā nikṛṣṭā jaḍatvāt parārthatvāt saṃsāra-bandha-rūpatvāc ca /
GE07bhg4c07u:228: itas tv acetana-varga-rūpāyāḥ kṣetra-lakṣaṇāyāḥ prakṛter anyāṃ vilakṣaṇāṃ tu-śabdād
GE07bhg4c07u:229: yathā-kathaṃcid apy abhedāyogyāṃ jīva-bhūtāṃ cetanātmikāṃ kṣetrajña-lakṣaṇāṃ me mamātma-bhūtāṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:230: viśuddhāṃ parāṃ prakṛṣṭāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi he mahābāho,
GE07bhg4c07u:232: dhāryate svato viśīrya uttamyate anena jīvenātmanānupraviśa nāma-rūpe vyākaravāṇi iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:235: viśvanāthaḥ - iyaṃ prakṛtir variyaṅgākhyā śaktir aparānutkṛṣṭā jaḍatvāt /
GE07bhg4c07u:236: ito 'nyāṃ prakṛtiṃ taṭasthāṃ śaktiṃ jīva-bhūtāṃ parām utkṛṣṭāṃ viddhi caitanyatvāt /
GE07bhg4c07u:237: asyā utkṛṣṭatve hetuḥ yayā cetanayedaṃ jagad acetanaṃ svabhogārthaṃ gṛhyate //5//
GE07bhg4c07u:238: baladevaḥ - eṣā prakṛtir aparā nikṛṣṭā jaḍatvād bhogyatvāc ceto jaḍāyāḥ prakṛter anyāṃ parāṃ cetanatvād bhoktṛtvāc cotkṛṣṭāṃ jīva-bhūtāṃ me madīyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi /
GE07bhg4c07u:241: yayā cetanayā idaṃ jagat sva-karma-dvārā dhāryate śayyāsanādivat sva-bhogāya gṛhyate /
GE07bhg4c07u:242: śrutiś ca harer eveyaṃ śaktis tvayīty āha pradhāna-kṣetrajña-patir guṇeśaḥ [ŚvetU 6.16] iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:245: ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayas tathā //6//
GE07bhg4c07u:246: śrīdharaḥ - anayoḥ prakṛtitvaṃ darśayan svasya tad-dvārā sṛṣṭy-ādi-kāraṇatvam āha etad iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:247: ete kṣetra-kṣetrajña-rūpe prakṛtī yonī kāraṇa-bhūte yeṣāṃ tāny etad-yonīni /
GE07bhg4c07u:250: cetanā tu mad-aṃśa-bhūtā bhoktṛtvena deheṣu praviśya svakarmaṇā tāni dhārayati /
GE07bhg4c07u:251: te ca madīye prakṛtī mattaḥ sambhūte /
GE07bhg4c07u:252: ato 'ham eva kṛtsnasya sa-prakṛtikasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:257: madhusūdanaḥ - ukta-prakṛti-dvaye kārya-liṅgakam anumānaṃ pramāṇayan svasya tad-dvārā jaga-sṛṣṭy-ādi-kāraṇatvaṃ darśayati etad-yonīnīti /
GE07bhg4c07u:258: ete aparatvena paratvena ca prāg-ukte kṣetra-kṣetrajña-lakṣaṇe prakṛtī yonir yeṣāṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:259: tāny etad-yonīni bhūtāni bhavana-dharmakāṇi sarvāṇi cetanācetanātmakāni janimanti
GE07bhg4c07u:261: kāryāṇāṃ cid-acid-granthi-rūpatvāt kāraṇam api cid-acid-granthi-rūpam anuminv ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:262: evaṃ kṣetra-kṣetrajña-lakṣaṇe mamopādhi-bhūte yataḥ prakṛtī bhavatas tatas tad-dvārāhaṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:263: sarvajñaḥ sarveśvaro 'nanta-śakti-māyopādhiḥ kṛtsnasya carācarātmakasya jagataḥ sarvasya
GE07bhg4c07u:264: kārya-vargasya prabhava utpatti-kāraṇaṃ pralayas tathā vināśa-kāraṇam /
GE07bhg4c07u:266: māyāvy aham evopādānaṃ draṣṭā cety arthaḥ //6//
GE07bhg4c07u:267: viśvanāthaḥ - etac chakti-dvaya-dvāraiva svasya jagat-kāraṇatvam āha etad iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:268: ete māyā-śakti-jīva-śaktī kṣetra-kṣetrajña-rūpe yonī kāraṇa-bhūte yeṣāṃ tāni sthāvara-jaṅgamātmakāni bhūtāni jānīhi /
GE07bhg4c07u:269: ataḥ kṛtsnasya sarvasyāsya jagataḥ prabhavo mac-chakti-dvaya-prabhūtatvād aham eva sraṣṭā /
GE07bhg4c07u:270: pralayas tac-chaktimati mayy eva pralīna-bhāvitvād aham evāsya saṃhartā //6//
GE07bhg4c07u:271: baladevaḥ -- etac chakti-dvaya-dvāraiva sarva-jagat-kāraṇatāṃ svasyāha etad iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:272: sarvāṇi sthira-carāṇi bhūtāny etad-yonīni upadhāraya viddhi /
GE07bhg4c07u:273: ete 'para-pare kṣetra-kṣetrajña-śabda-vācye mac-chaktī yonī kāraṇa-bhūte yeṣāṃ tānīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:274: te ca prakṛtī madīye matta eva sambhūte /
GE07bhg4c07u:275: ataḥ kṛtsnasya sa-prakṛtikasya jagato 'ham eva prabhava utpatti-hetuḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:277: tasya pralaya-saṃhartāpy aham eva pralīyate 'nena iti vyutpatteḥ //6//
GE07bhg4c07u:279: mattaḥ parataraṃ nānyat kiñcid asti dhanañjaya /
GE07bhg4c07u:280: mayi sarvam idaṃ protaṃ sūtre maṇi-gaṇā iva //7//
GE07bhg4c07u:281: śrīdharaḥ - yasmād evaṃ tasmāt matta iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:282: mattaḥ sakāśāt parataraṃ śreṣṭhaṃ jagataḥ sṛṣṭi-saṃhārayoḥ svatantraṃ kāraṇaṃ kiñcid api nāsti /
GE07bhg4c07u:283: sthiti-hetur apy aham evety āha mayīti /
GE07bhg4c07u:284: mayi sarvam idaṃ jagat protaṃ grathitam āśritam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:286: madhusūdanaḥ - yasmād aham eva māyayā sarvasya jagato janma-sthiti-bhaṅga-hetus tasmāt paramārthataḥ matta iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:290: rajataṃ parataraṃ paramārtha-satyam anyat kiṃcid api nāsti he dhanañjaya /
GE07bhg4c07u:291: mayi kalpitaṃ paramārthato na matto bhidyata ity arthaḥ tad ananyatvam ārambhaṇa-śabdādibhyaḥ [Vs 2.1.14] iti nyāyāt /
GE07bhg4c07u:292: vyavahāra-dṛṣṭyā tu mayi sad-rūpe sphuraṇa-rūpe ca sarvam idaṃ jaḍa-jātaṃ protaṃ grathitaṃ mat-sattayā sad iva mat-sphuraṇena ca sphurad iva vyavahārāya māyā-mayāya kalpate /
GE07bhg4c07u:295: athavā sūtre taijasātmani hiraṇyagarbhe svapna-dṛśi svapna-protā maṇi-gaṇā iveti sarvāṃśe dṛṣṭānto vyākhyeyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:296: anye tu param ataḥ setūn māna-sambandha-bheda-vyapadeśebhyaḥ [Vs 3.2.31] iti sūtroktasya pūrva-pakṣasyottaratvena ślokam imaṃ vyācakṣate /
GE07bhg4c07u:297: mattaḥ sarvajñāt sarva-śakteḥ sarva-kāraṇāt parataraṃ praśasyataraṃ sarvasya jagataḥ sṛṣṭi-saṃhārayoḥ svatantraṃ kāraṇam anyan nāsti he dhanañjaya
GE07bhg4c07u:298: yasmād evaṃ tasmān mayi sarva-kāraṇe sarvam idaṃ kārya-jātaṃ protaṃ grathitaṃ nānyan na /
GE07bhg4c07u:299: sūtre maṇi-gaṇā iveti dṛṣṭāntas tu grathitatva-mātre na tu kāraṇatve /
GE07bhg4c07u:300: kanake kuṇḍalādivad iti tu yogyo dṛṣṭāntaḥ //7//
GE07bhg4c07u:301: viśvanāthaḥ -- yasmād evaṃ tasmād aham eva sarvam ity āha mattaḥ parataram anyat kiñcid apii nāsti /
GE07bhg4c07u:303: tathā ca śrutiḥ ekam evādvitīyaṃ brahma,
GE07bhg4c07u:305: evaṃ svasya sarvātmakatvam uktvā sarvāntaryāmitvaṃ cāha mayīti /
GE07bhg4c07u:306: sarvam idaṃ cij-jaḍātmakaṃ jagat mat-kāryatvān mad-ātmakam api punar mayy antaryāmiṇi protaṃ grathitaṃ yathā sūtre maṇi-gaṇāḥ protāḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:307: madhusūdana-sarasvatī-pādās tu sūtre maṇi-gaṇā iveti dṛṣṭāntas tu grathitatva-mātre,
GE07bhg4c07u:308: na tu kāraṇatve kanake kuṇḍalādivad iti tu yogyo dṛṣṭānta ity āhuḥ //7//
GE07bhg4c07u:309: baladevaḥ - nanu sthira-carayor apara-parayoḥ prakṛtyor api tvam eva tac-chaktimān yonir ity ukter nikhila-jagad-bījatvaṃ tava pratītaṃ,
GE07bhg4c07u:312: tato yad uttarataraṃ tad arūpam anāmayam /
GE07bhg4c07u:313: ya etad vidur amṛtās te bhavanti athetare
GE07bhg4c07u:315: [ŚvetU 3.10] iti śravaṇād iti cet tatrāha matta iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:316: mattas tvat-sakhāt kṛṣṇāt parataraḥ śreṣṭham anyat kiñcid api nāsty aham eva sarva-śreṣṭhaṃ vastv ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:317: nanu tato yad uttarataram ity ādāv anyathā śrutim iti cen mandam etat kṣodākṣamatvāt / tathā hi
GE07bhg4c07u:320: tam eva vidvān amṛta iha bhavati
GE07bhg4c07u:322: śvetāśvataraiḥ sarva-jagad-bījasya mahā-puruṣasya viṣṇor jñānam amṛtasya panthās tato nāstīty upadiśya tad-upapādanāya
GE07bhg4c07u:325: iti tasyaiva paramatvaṃ tad-itarasya tad-asambhavaṃ ca pratipādya /
GE07bhg4c07u:326: tato yad uttarotaraṃ ity ādinā pūrvoktam eva nigamitam /
GE07bhg4c07u:330: mad-anyasya kasyacid api śraiṣṭhyābhāvād aham eva mad-anya-sarvāśraya ity āha mayīti /
GE07bhg4c07u:335: praṇavaḥ sarva-vedeṣu śabdaḥ khe pauruṣaṃ nṛṣu //8//
GE07bhg4c07u:336: śrīdharaḥ - jagataḥ sthiti-hetutvam eva prapañcati raso 'ham iti pañcabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:337: apsu raso 'haṃ rasa-tan-mātra-rūpayā vibhūtyā tad-āśrayatenāpsu-sthito 'ham ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:339: candre sūrye ca prakāśa-rūpayā vibhūtyā tad-āśrayatvena sthito 'ham ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:341: sarveṣu vedeṣu vaikharī-rūpeṣu tan-mūla-bhūtaḥ praṇava oṅkāro 'smi /
GE07bhg4c07u:345: madhusūdanaḥ - avādīnāṃ rasādiṣu protatva-pratīteḥ kathaṃ tvayi sarvam idaṃ protam iti ca na śaṅkyaṃ rasādi-rūpeṇa mamaiva sthitatvād ity āha raso 'ham iti pañcabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:346: rasaḥ puṇyo madhuras tan-mātra-rūpaḥ sarvāsām apāṃ sāraḥ kāraṇa-bhūto yo 'psu sarvāsvanugataḥ so 'haṃ he kaunteya tad-rūpe mayi sarvā āpaḥ protā ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:349: tathā porabhā prakāśaḥ śaśi-sūryayor aham asmi /
GE07bhg4c07u:350: prakāśa-sāmānya-rūpe mayi śaśi-sūryau protāv ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:351: tathā praṇaya oṅkāraḥ sarva-vedeṣv anusyūto 'haṃ tad yathā śaṅkunā sarvāṇi parṇāni saṃtṛṇṇāny evam oṅkāreṇa sarvā vāk iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:353: sarvā vāk sarvo veda ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:355: pauruṣaṃ puruṣatva-sāmānyaṃ nṛṣu puruṣeṣu yad anusyūtaṃ tad aham /
GE07bhg4c07u:356: sāmānya-rūpe mayi sarve viśeṣāḥ protāḥ śrautair dundubhy-ādi-dṛṣṭāntair iti sarvatra draṣṭavyam //8//
GE07bhg4c07u:357: viśvanāthaḥ - sva-kārye jagaty atra yathāham antaryāmi-rūpeṇa praviṣṭo varte,
GE07bhg4c07u:358: tathā kvacit kāraṇa-rūpeṇa kvacit kāryeṣu manuṣyādiṣu sāra-rūpeṇāpy ahaṃ varta ity āha raso 'ham iti caturbhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:359: apsu rasa tat-kāraṇa-bhūto mad-vibhūtir ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:364: nṛṣu pauruṣam sakala udyama-viśeṣa eva manuṣya-sāraḥ //8//
GE07bhg4c07u:365: baladevaḥ - tattvaṃ darśayati raso 'ham iti pañcabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:366: apsu raso 'haṃ rasa-tan-mātrayā vibhūtyā tāḥ pālayan tāsv ahaṃ vartate /
GE07bhg4c07u:368: śaśini sūrye cāhaṃ prabhāsmi prabhayā vibhūtyā tau pālayan tayor ahaṃ varte /
GE07bhg4c07u:375: puṇyo gandhaḥ pṛthivyāṃ ca tejaś cāsmi vibhāvasau /
GE07bhg4c07u:380: yad vā vibhūti-rūpeṇāśrayatvasya vivakṣitatvāt surabhi-gandhasyaivotkṛṣṭatayā vibhūtitvāt puṇyo gandha ity uktam /
GE07bhg4c07u:381: tathā vibhāvasāgnau yat tejo duḥsahā sahajā dīptis tad aham /
GE07bhg4c07u:382: sarva-bhūteṣu jīvanaṃ prāṇa-dhāraṇa-vāyur aham ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:384: madhusūdanaḥ - puṇyaḥ surabhir avikṛto gandhaḥ sarva-pṛthivī-sāmānya-rūpas tan-mātrākhyaḥ pṛthivyām anusyūto 'ham /
GE07bhg4c07u:386: śabda-sparśa-rūpa-rasa-gandhānāṃ hi svabhāvata eva puṇyatvam avikṛtatvaṃ prāṇinām adharma-viśeṣāt tu teṣām apuṇyatvaṃ na tu svabhāvata iti draṣṭavyam
GE07bhg4c07u:387: tathā vibhāvasāv agnau yat tejaḥ sarva-dahana-prakāśana-sāmarthya-rūpam uṣṇa-sparśa-sahitaṃ sita-bhāsvaraṃ rūpaṃ puṇyaṃ tad aham asmi /
GE07bhg4c07u:388: ca-kārādyo vāyau puṇya uṣṇa-sparśāturāṇām āpyāyakaḥ śīta-sparśaḥ so 'py aham iti draṣṭavyam /
GE07bhg4c07u:389: sarva-bhūteṣu sarveṣu prāṇiṣu jīvanaṃ prāṇa-dhāraṇam āyur aham asmi /
GE07bhg4c07u:390: tad-rūpe mayi sarve prāṇinaḥ protā ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:391: tapasviṣu nityaṃ tapo-yukteṣu vānaprasthādiṣu yat tapaḥ śītoṣṇa-kṣut-pipāsādi-dvandva-sahana-sāmarthya-rūpaṃ tad aham asmi /
GE07bhg4c07u:392: tad-rūpe mayi tapasvinaḥ protā viśeṣaṇābhāve viśiṣṭābhāvāt /
GE07bhg4c07u:393: tapaś ceti ca-kāreṇa cittaikāgryam āntaraṃ jihvopasthādi-nigraha-lakṣaṇaṃ bāhyaṃ ca sarvaṃ tapaḥ samuccīyate //9//
GE07bhg4c07u:394: viśvanāthaḥ -- puṇyo 'vikṛto gandhaḥ puṇyas tu cārv api ity amaraḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:401: vibhāvasau vahnau tejaḥ sarva-vastu-pacana-prakāśanādi-sāmarthya-rūpaṃ ca śadād vāyau yaḥ puṇyaḥ sparśa uṣṇa-sparśa-vyākulānām āpāyakaḥ so 'ham iti bodhyam /
GE07bhg4c07u:404: bījaṃ māṃ sarva-bhūtānāṃ viddhi pārtha sanātanam /
GE07bhg4c07u:405: buddhir buddhimatām asmi tejas tejasvinām aham //10//
GE07bhg4c07u:413: madhusūdanaḥ - sarvāṇi bhūtāni sva-sva-bījeṣu protāni na tu svayīti cen nety āha bījam iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:414: yat sarva-bhūtānāṃ sthāvara-jaṅgamānām ekaṃ bījaṃ kāraṇaṃ /
GE07bhg4c07u:415: sanātanaṃ nityaṃ bījāntarānapekṣaṃ na tu prativyakti-bhinnam anityaṃ vā tad-avyākṛtākhyaṃ sarva-bījaṃ mām eva viddhi na tu mad-bhinnaṃ he pārtha
GE07bhg4c07u:416: ato yuktam ekasminn eva mayi sarva-bīje protatvaṃ sarveṣām ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:417: kiṃ ca buddhis tattvātattva-viveka-sāmarthyaṃ tādṛśa-buddhimatām aham asmi /
GE07bhg4c07u:418: buddhi-rūpe mayi buddhimantaḥ protā viśeṣaṇābhāve viśiṣṭābhāvasyoktatvāt /
GE07bhg4c07u:419: tathā tejaḥ prāgalbhyaṃ parābhibhava-sāmarthyaṃ pariś cānabhibhāvyatvaṃ tejasvināṃ tathāvidha-prāgalbhya-yuktānāṃ yat tad aham asmi,
GE07bhg4c07u:420: tejo-rūpe mayi tejasvinaḥ protā ity arthaḥ //10//
GE07bhg4c07u:421: viśvanāthaḥ - bījam avikṛtaṃ kāraṇaṃ pradhānākhyam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:422: sanātanaṃ nityaṃ buddhimatāṃ buddhir eva sāraḥ //10//
GE07bhg4c07u:423: baladevaḥ - sarva-bhūtānāṃ carācarāṇāṃ yad eka-bījaṃ sanātanaṃ nityaṃ,
GE07bhg4c07u:424: na tu prativyakti-bhinnam anityaṃ vā tat pradhānākhyaṃ sarva-bījaṃ mām eva viddhi tad-rūpayā vibhūtyā tāny ahaṃ pālayāmi tat-pareṇa hi tāni puṣyante /
GE07bhg4c07u:426: tejaḥ prāgalbhyaṃ parābhibhava-sāmarthyaṃ parān abhibhāvyatvaṃ ca //10//
GE07bhg4c07u:432: rāgaḥ punar abhilaṣite 'rthe prāpte 'pi punar adhike 'rthe citta-rañjanātmakas tṛṣṇāpara-paryāyas tāmasaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:433: tābhyāṃ vivarjitaṃ balavatāṃ balam aham asmi /
GE07bhg4c07u:436: madhusūdanaḥ - aprāpto viṣayaḥ prāpti-kāraṇābhāve 'pi prāpyatām ity ākāraś citta-vṛtti-viśeṣaḥ kāmaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:437: prāpto viṣayaḥ kṣaya-kāraṇe saty api na kṣīyatām ity evam-ākāraś citta-vṛtti-viśeṣo
GE07bhg4c07u:438: rañjanātmā rāgas tābhyāṃ viśeṣeṇa varjitaṃ sarvathā tad-akāraṇaṃ rajas-tamo-virahitaṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:439: yat svadharmānuṣṭhānāya dehendriyādi-dhāraṇa-sāmarthyaṃ sāttvikaṃ balam balavatāṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:441: tad-rūpe mayi balavantaḥ protā ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:443: kāma-rāga-vivarjitam eva balaṃ mad-rūpatvena dhyeyaṃ na tu saṃsāriṇāṃ kāma-rāga-kāraṇaṃ balam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:445: dharmo dharma-śāstraṃ tenāviruddho 'pratiṣiddho dharmānukūlo vā yo bhūteṣu prāṇiṣu kāmaḥ śāstrānumata-jāyā-putra-vittādi-viṣayo 'bhilāṣaḥ so 'ham asmi /
GE07bhg4c07u:447: śāstrāviruddha-kāma-bhūte mayi tathāvidha-kāma-yuktānāṃ bhūtānāṃ protatvam ity arthaḥ //11//
GE07bhg4c07u:453: rāgas tu prāpte 'py abhilaṣite 'rthe punas tato 'py adhike 'rthe citta-rañjanātmako 'titṛṣṇāpara-nāmā,
GE07bhg4c07u:454: tābhyāṃ vivarjitaṃ balaṃ sva-dharmānuṣṭhāna-sāmarthyam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:457: ye caiva sāttvikā bhāvā rājasās tāmasāś ca ye /
GE07bhg4c07u:458: matta eveti tān viddhi na tv ahaṃ teṣu te mayi //12//
GE07bhg4c07u:463: prāṇināṃ sva-karma-vaśāj jāyante tān matta eva jātān iti viddhi /
GE07bhg4c07u:465: evam api teṣv ahaṃ na varte /
GE07bhg4c07u:467: te tu mad-adhīnāḥ santo mayi vartanta ity arthaḥ //12//
GE07bhg4c07u:468: madhusūdanaḥ - kim evaṃ parigaṇanena ye caiveti /
GE07bhg4c07u:469: ye cānye 'pi bhāvāś citta-pariṇāmāḥ sāttvikāḥ śama-damādayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:471: ye ca tāmasāḥ śoka-mohādayaḥ prāṇinām avidyā-karmādi-vaśāj jāyante tān matta eva jāyamānān iti ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhava ity ādy-ukta-prakāreṇa viddhi samastān eva /
GE07bhg4c07u:472: athavā sāttvikā rājasās tāmasāś ca bhāvāḥ sarve 'pi jaḍa-vargā vyākhyeyā viśeṣa-hetv-abhāvāt /
GE07bhg4c07u:474: evam api na tv ahaṃ teṣu,
GE07bhg4c07u:475: matto jātatve 'pi tad-vaśas tad-vikāra-rūṣito rajju-khaṇḍa iva kalpita-sarva-vikāra-rūṣito 'haṃ na bhavāmi saṃsārīva /
GE07bhg4c07u:476: te tu bhāvā mayi rajjvām iva sarpādayaḥ kalpitā mad-adhīna-sattā-sphūrtikā mad-adhīnā ity arthaḥ //12//
GE07bhg4c07u:477: viśvanāthaḥ - evaṃ vastu-kāraṇa-bhūtā vastu-sāra-bhūtāś ca rākṣasādyāś ca vibhūtayaḥ kāścid uktāḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:479: mad-adhīnaṃ vastu-mātram eva mad-vibhūtir ity āha ye caiveti /
GE07bhg4c07u:486: te tu mayi mad-adhīnāḥ santa eva vartante //12//
GE07bhg4c07u:487: baladevaḥ -- evaṃ kāṃścid vibhūtir abhidhāya samāsena sarvās tāḥ prāha ye caiveti /
GE07bhg4c07u:488: ye mitho vilakṣaṇa-svabhāvāḥ sāttvikādayo bhāvāḥ prāṇināṃ śarīrendriya-viṣayātmanā ta-kāraṇatvena cāvasthitās tān sarvān tat-tac-chakty-upetān matta evopapannān viddhi /
GE07bhg4c07u:489: na tv ahaṃ teṣu varte naivāhaṃ tad-adhīna-sthitiḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:492: tribhir guṇa-mayair bhāvair ebhiḥ sarvam idaṃ jagat /
GE07bhg4c07u:493: mohitaṃ nābhijānāti mām ebhyaḥ param avyayam //13//
GE07bhg4c07u:494: śrīdharaḥ - evambhūtam īśvaraṃ tvām ayaṃ janaḥ kim iti na jānātīti ?
GE07bhg4c07u:496: tribhis trividhair ebhiḥ pūrvoktair guṇa-mayaiḥ kāma-lobhādibhir guṇa-vikārair bhāvaiḥ svabhāvair mohitam idaṃ jagat /
GE07bhg4c07u:502: madhusūdanaḥ - tava parameśvarasya svātantrye nitya-śuddha-buddham ukta-svabhāvatve ca sati kuto jagatas tvad-ātmakasya saṃsāritvam /
GE07bhg4c07u:504: tad eva kuta ity ata āha tribhir iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:505: ebhiḥ prāg-uktais tribhis trividhair guṇa-mayaiḥ sattva-rajas-tamo-guṇa-vikārair
GE07bhg4c07u:506: bhāvaiḥ sarvair api bhavana-dharmabhir sarvam idaṃ jagat prāṇi-jātaṃ mohitam vivekāyogyatvam
GE07bhg4c07u:507: āpāditaṃ sad ebhyo guṇamayebhyo bhāvebhyaḥ param eṣāṃ kalpanādhiṣṭhānam atyanta-vilakṣaṇam
GE07bhg4c07u:508: avyayaṃ sarva-vikriyā-śūnyam aprapañcam ānanda-ghanam ātma-prakāśam avyavahitam api māṃ nābhijānāti /
GE07bhg4c07u:509: tataś ca svarūpāparicayāt saṃsaratīvety aho daurbhāgyam aviveki-janasyety anukrośaṃ darśayati bhagavān //13//
GE07bhg4c07u:510: viśvanāthaḥ - nanv evambhūtaṃ tvā parameśvaraṃ katham ayaṃ jano na jānātīty ata āha tribhir iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:511: guṇamayaiḥ śama-damādi-harṣādi-śokādyair bhāvaiḥ svābhāvībhūtair jagaj jagaj-jāta-jīva-vṛndaṃ mohitaṃ sat māṃ nirguṇatvād ebhyaḥ param avyayaṃ nirvikāram //13//
GE07bhg4c07u:512: baladevaḥ - atha śakti-dvaya-viviktaṃ svasya dhyeya-svarūpaṃ darśayan tasyājñāne tad-āsaktim eva hetum āha tribhir iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:513: ebhiḥ pūrvoditair guṇamayair man-māyā-guṇa-kāryais trividhaiḥ sāttvikādibhir bhāvair
GE07bhg4c07u:515: mohitam avivekitāṃ nītaṃ sat sarvam idaṃ jagat surāsura-manuṣyādy-ātmanāvasthitaṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:516: jīva-vṛndaṃ kartṛ ebhyaḥ sāttvikādibhyo bhāvebhyaḥ paraṃ tair aspṛṣṭam ananta-kalyāṇa-guṇa-ratnākaraṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:517: vijñānānanda-ghanaṃ sarveśvaram avyayam apracyuta-svabhāvaṃ māṃ kṛṣṇaṃ nābhijānāti
GE07bhg4c07u:520: daivī hy eṣā guṇa-mayī mama māyā duratyayā /
GE07bhg4c07u:521: mām eva ye prapadyante māyām etāṃ taranti te //14//
GE07bhg4c07u:527: mama parameśvarasya śaktir māyā duratyayā dustarā hi /
GE07bhg4c07u:529: tathāpi mām eva ity eva-kāreṇāvyabhicāriṇyā bhaktyā ye prapadyante bhajanti māyām etāṃ sudustarām api te taranti /
GE07bhg4c07u:532: tat-parivarjanāsāmārthyān na kadācid api māyātikramaḥ syād vastu-vivekāsāmārthya-hetoḥ
GE07bhg4c07u:535: daivī eko devo sarva-bhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ [ŚvetU 6.11] ity-ādi-śruti-pratipādite svatodyotanavati
GE07bhg4c07u:536: deve sva-prakāśa-caitanyānande nirvibhāge tad-āśrayatayā tad-viṣayatayā ca kalpitā
GE07bhg4c07u:537: āśrayatva-viṣayatva-bhāginī nirvibhāga-citir eva kevalā [Saṃ.Śārī 1.319] ity ukteḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:545: avidyā sarva-prapañca-prakṛtiḥ māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyān māyinaṃ tu maheśvaram [ŚvetU 4.19] iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:547: jīveśvara-jagad-vibhāga-śūnye caitanye 'dhyastānādir avidyā sattva-prādhānyena svacchā darpaṇa iva mukha-bhāsaṃ cid-ābhāsam āgṛhṇāti /
GE07bhg4c07u:548: tataś ca bimba-sthānīyaḥ parameśvara upādhi-doṣānāskanditaḥ pratibimba-sthānīyaś ca jīva upādhi-doṣāskanditaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:549: īśvarāc ca jīva-bhogāyākāśādi-krameṇa śarīrendriya-saṅghātas tad-bhogyaś ca kṛtsnaḥ prapañco jāyata iti kalpanā bhavati /
GE07bhg4c07u:550: bimba-pratibimba-mukhānugata-mukhavac ceśa-jīvānugataṃ māyopādhi caitanyaṃ sākṣīti kalpyate /
GE07bhg4c07u:551: tenaiva ca svādhyastā māyā tat-kāryaṃ ca kṛtsnaṃ prakāśyate /
GE07bhg4c07u:552: ataḥ sākṣy-abhiprāyeṇa daivīti bimbeśvarābhiprāyeṇa tu memeti bhagavtoktam /
GE07bhg4c07u:553: yadyapy avidyā-pratibimba eka eva jīvas tathāpy avidyā-gatānām antaḥ-karaṇa-saṃskārāṇāṃ bhinnatvāt tad-bhedenāntaḥ-karaṇopādhes
GE07bhg4c07u:554: tasyātra bheda-vyapadeśo mām eva ye prapadyante duṣkṛtino mūḍhā na prapadyante,
GE07bhg4c07u:556: śrutau ca tad yo devānāṃ pratyabudhyata sa eva tad abhavat tatha rṣīṇāṃ tathā manuṣyāṇām [BAU 1.4.10] ity ādiḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:557: antaḥ-karaṇopādhi-bhedāparyālocane tu jīvatva-prayojakopādher ekatvād ekatvenaivātra vyapadeśaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:559: prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ caiva viddhy anādī ubhāv api [Gītā 13.19],
GE07bhg4c07u:560: mamaivāṃśo jīva-loke jīva-bhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ [Gītā 15.7] ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c07u:561: śrutau ca brahma vā idam agra āsīt tad ātmānam evāvedahaṃ brahmāsmīti tasmāt tat sarvam abhavat [BAU 1.4.10],
GE07bhg4c07u:565: bhāgo jīvaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ sa cānantyāya kalpate //
GE07bhg4c07u:567: yadyapi darpaṇa-gataś caitra-pratibimbaḥ svaṃ paraṃ ca na jānāty acetanāṃśasyaiva tatra pratibimbitatvāt tathāpi cit-pratibimbaś cittvād eva svaṃ paraṃ ca jānāti /
GE07bhg4c07u:570: sa ca yāvat sva-bimbaikyam ātmano na jānāti tāvaj jala-sūrya iva jala-gata-kampādikam upādhi-gataṃ vikāra-sahasram anubhavati /
GE07bhg4c07u:573: ataeva jīvo 'ntaḥkaraṇāvacchinnatvāt tat-sambaddham evākṣyādi-dvārā bhāsayan kiṃcij jño bhavati /
GE07bhg4c07u:574: tataś ca jānāmi karomi bhuñje cety anartha-śata-bhājanaṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c07u:575: sa ced bimba-bhūtaṃ bhagavantam ananta-śaktiṃ māyā-niyantāraṃ sarva-vidaṃ sarva-phala-dātāram aniśam ānanda-ghana-mūrtim
GE07bhg4c07u:576: anekaānavatārān bhaktānugrahāya vidadhatam ārādhayati samarpaṇena tadā bimba-samarpitasya pratibimbe pratiphalanāt sarvān api puruṣārthān āsādayati
GE07bhg4c07u:580: yad yaj jano bhagavate vidadhīta mānaṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:581: tac cātmane prati-mukhasya yathā mukha-śrīḥ // [BhP 7.9.11] iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:582: darpaṇa-pratibimbitasya mukhasya tilakādi-śrīr apekṣitā ced bimba-bhūte mukhe samarpaṇīyā /
GE07bhg4c07u:583: sā svayam eva tatra pratiphalati nānyaḥ kaścit tat-prāptāv upāyo 'sti yathā tathā
GE07bhg4c07u:584: bimba-bhūteśvare samarpitam eva tat-pratibimba-bhūto jīvo labhate nānyaḥ kaścit tasya
GE07bhg4c07u:586: tasya yadā bhagavantam anantam anavaratam ārādhayato 'ntaḥkaraṇaṃ jñāna-pratibandhaka-pāpena
GE07bhg4c07u:587: rahitaṃ jñānānukūla-puṇyena copacitaṃ bhavati tadātinirmale mukura-maṇḍala iva mukham
GE07bhg4c07u:591: tasyāṃ ca pratiphalaitaṃ caitanyaṃ sadya eva sva-viṣayāśrayām avidyām unmūlayati dīpa iva tamaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:592: tatas tasyā nāśāt tayā vṛttyā sahākhilasya kārya-prapañcasya nāśaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:594: tad etad āha bhagavān mām eva ye prapadyante māyām etāṃ taranti te iti / ātmety
GE07bhg4c07u:597: tam eva viditvātimṛtyum eti [ŚvetU 6.15] ity ādi-śrutiṣv ivehāpi mām evety eva-kāro 'py anuparaktatā-pratipatty-arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:598: mām eva sarvopādhi-virahitaṃ vidānanda-sadātmānam akhaṇḍaṃ ye prapadyante vedānta-vākya-janyayā
GE07bhg4c07u:601: viṣayīkurvanti te ye kecid etāṃ duratikramaṇīyām api māyām akhilānartha-janma-bhuvam
GE07bhg4c07u:602: anāyāsenaiva taranti atikrāmanti tasya ha na devāś canābhūtyā īśata ātmā hy eṣā sa
GE07bhg4c07u:607: prapaśyantīti vaktavye prapadyanta ity ukte 'rthe mad-eka-śaraṇāḥ santo mām eva bhagavantaṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:612: ativāhayanti te mat-prema-mahānanda-samudra-magna-manasas tathā samasta-māyā-guṇa-vikārair nābhibhūyante /
GE07bhg4c07u:613: kintu mad-vilāsa-vinoda-kuśalā ete mad-unmūlana-samarthā iti śaṅkamāneva māyā tebhyo 'pasarati vāravilāsinīva krodhanebhyas tapodhanebhyas tasmān māyā-taraṇārthī mām
GE07bhg4c07u:614: īdṛśam eva santatam anucintayed ity apy abhipretaṃ bhagavataḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:616: viśvanāthaḥ - nanu tarhi triguṇa-maya-mohāt katham uttīrṇā bhavanti ?
GE07bhg4c07u:618: daivī viṣayānandena dīvyantīti devā jīvās tadīyā teṣāṃ mohayitrīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:620: mama parameśvarasya māyā bahiraṅgā śaktir duratyayā duratikramā /
GE07bhg4c07u:621: pāśa-pakṣe, chettum udgranthayituṃ vā kenāpy aśaktyety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:622: kintu mad-vāci viśvasihi iti sva-vakṣaḥ spṛṣṭvāha māṃ śyāmasundarākāram eva //14//
GE07bhg4c07u:623: baladevaḥ -- nanu triguṇāyas-tan-māyāyā nityatvāt tad-dhetukasya mohasya vinivṛttir durghaṭeti cet tatrāha daivīti /
GE07bhg4c07u:627: śrutiś caivam āha - māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyān māyinaṃ tu maheśvaram [ŚvetU 4.10] ity ādyā /
GE07bhg4c07u:629: śleṣeṇa triguṇitā rajjur ivāti-dṛḍhatayā jīvānāṃ bandhu-hetuḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:631: rajju-pakṣe chettum udgrathituṃ ca tair aśaktyety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:632: yadyapy etādṛśī tathāpi mad-bhaktyā tad-vinivṛttiḥ syād ity āha mām iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:633: māṃ sarveśvaraṃ māyā-niyantāraṃ sva-prapanna-vātsalya-nīradhiṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ye tādṛśa-sat-prasaṄgāt prapadyate śaraṇaṃ gacchanti te etām arṇavam
GE07bhg4c07u:635: tāṃ tīrtvānadaika-rasaṃ prasādābhimukhaṃ sva-svāminaṃ māṃ prāpnuvantīti /
GE07bhg4c07u:636: mām evety eva-kāro mad-anyeṣāṃ vidhi-rudrādīnāṃ prapattyā tasyās taraṇaṃ nety āha śrutiś caivam āha tam eva viditvety ādyā mucukundaṃ prati devāś ca -
GE07bhg4c07u:637: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te ṛte kaivalyam adya naḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:638: eka eveśvaras tasya bhagavān viṣṇur avyayaḥ // [BhP 10.51.20] iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:639: ghaṇṭākarṇaṃ prati śivaś ca - mukti-pradātā sarveṣāṃ viṣṇur eva na saṃśayaḥ iti //14//
GE07bhg4c07u:641: na māṃ duṣkṛtino mūḍhāḥ prapadyante narādhamāḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:643: śrīdharaḥ - yady evaṃ tarhi sarve tvām eva kim iti na bhajanti ?
GE07bhg4c07u:645: nareṣu ye 'dhamās te māṃ na prapadyante na bhajanti /
GE07bhg4c07u:648: ato māyayāpahṛtaṃ nirastaṃ śāstrācāryopadeśābhyāṃ jātam api jñānaṃ yeṣāṃ te tathā /
GE07bhg4c07u:649: ataeva dambho darpo 'bhimānaś ca krodhaḥ pāruṣyam eva cety ādinā vakṣyamāṇam āsuraṃ bhāvam svabhāvaṃ prāptāḥ santo na māṃ bhajanti //15//
GE07bhg4c07u:650: madhusūdanaḥ - yady evaṃ tarhi kim iti nikhilānartha-mūla-māyonmūlanāya bhagavantaṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:651: bhavantam eva sarve na pratipadyante cira-saṃcita-durita-pratibandhād ity āha bhagavān na mām iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:653: ataeva nareṣu madhye 'dhamā iha sādhubhir garhaṇīyāḥ paratra cānartha-sahasra-bhājaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:654: kuto duṣkṛtam anartha-hetum eva sadā kurvanti yato mūḍhā idam artha-sādhanam idam anartha-sādhanam iti viveka-śūnyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:655: sati pramāṇe kuto na viviñcanti yato māyayāpahṛta-jñānāḥ śarīrendriya-saṃghāta-tādāmtya-bhrānti-rūpeṇa
GE07bhg4c07u:656: pariṇatayā māyayā pūrvoktayāpahṛtaṃ pratibaddhaṃ jñānaṃ viveka-sāmarthyaṃ yeṣāṃ te tathā /
GE07bhg4c07u:657: ataeva te dambho darpo 'bhimānaś ca krodhaḥ pāruṣyam eva ca [Gītā 16.4] ity ādināgre vakṣyamānam āsuraṃ bhāvaṃ hiṃsānṛtādi-svabhāvam
GE07bhg4c07u:658: āśritā mat-pratipatty-ayogyāḥ santo na māṃ sarveśvaraṃ prapadyante na bhajante /
GE07bhg4c07u:660: viśvanāthaḥ - nanu tarhi paṇḍitā api kecit kim iti tvāṃ na prapadyante ?
GE07bhg4c07u:661: tatra ye paṇḍitās te māṃ prapadyanta eva /
GE07bhg4c07u:662: paṇḍita-mānina eva na māṃ prapadyanta ity āha na mām iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:663: duṣkṛtino duṣṭāś ca te kṛtinaḥ paṇḍitāś ceti te kupaṇḍitā ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:665: eke mūḍhāḥ paśu-tulyāḥ karmiṇaḥ / yad uktaṃ -
GE07bhg4c07u:667: hitvā śṛṇvanty asad-gāthāḥ purīṣam iva viḍ-bhujaḥ // [BhP 3.32.19] iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:668: mukundaṃ ko vai na seveta vinā naretaraḥ iti ca /
GE07bhg4c07u:669: apare narādhamāḥ kañcit kālaṃ bhaktimattvena prāpta-naratvā apy ante phala-prāptau na sādhanopayoga iti matvā svecchayaiva bhakti-tyāginaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:670: svakartṛka-bhakti-tyāga-lakṣaṇam eva teṣām adhamatvam iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:671: apare śāstrādhyāpanādi-mattve 'pi māyayāpahṛtaṃ jñānam eṣāṃ te vaikuṇṭha-virājinī nārāyaṇa-mūrtir eva sārvakālikī-bhakti-prāpyā,
GE07bhg4c07u:672: na tu kṛṣṇa-rāmādi-mūrtir mānuṣīti manyamānā ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:673: yad vakṣyate avajānanti māṃ mūḍhā mānuṣīṃ tanum āśritam [Gītā 9.11] iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:674: te khalu māṃ prapadyamānā api na māṃ prapadyanta iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:676: asurā jarāsandhādayo mad-vigrahaṃ lakṣīkṛtya śarair vidhyanti /
GE07bhg4c07u:677: tathaiva dṛśyatādi-hetu-mat-kutarkair mad-vigrahaṃ vaikuṇṭha-stham api khaṇḍayanty eva /
GE07bhg4c07u:679: baladevaḥ - nanu cet tvām eva prapannā vimucyante tarhi paṇḍitā api kecit kim iti tvāṃ na prapadyante tatrāha na mām iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:680: duṣṭāś ca te kṛtinaḥ śāstrārtha-kuśalāś ceti duṣkṛtinaḥ kupaṇḍitās te māṃ na prapadyante /
GE07bhg4c07u:686: te catur-vidhāḥ - eke māyayā mūḍhāḥ karma-jaḍā indrādivan mām api viṣṇuṃ karmāṅgaṃ jīvavat karmādhīnaṃ manyamānāḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:687: apare māyayā narādhamā viprādi-kula-janmanā narottamatāṃ prāpyāpy asat kāvyārthāsattyā pāmaratā-bhājaḥ / yad uktam -
GE07bhg4c07u:689: hitvā śṛṇvanty asad-gāthā purīṣam iva viḍ-bhujaḥ // [BhP 3.32.19] iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:691: te hi sārvajña-sārvaiśvarya-sarva-sraṣṭṛtva-muktidatvādi dharmaiḥ śruti-sahasra-prasiddham api mām īśvaram apalapantaḥ prakṛtim eva sarva-sraṣṭrīṃ mokṣa-dātrīṃ ca kalpayanti /
GE07bhg4c07u:693: kecit tu māyayaivāsuraṃ bhāvam āśritā nirviśeṣa-cin-mātra-vādinaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:694: asurā yathā nikhilānanda-karaṃ mad-vigrahaṃ śarair vidhyanti tathādṛśyatvādi-hetubhis
GE07bhg4c07u:695: te nitya-caitanyātmatayā śruti-prasiddham api taṃ khaṇḍayantīti tatrāpi tādṛśa-buddhy-utpādanī
GE07bhg4c07u:699: ārto jijñāsur arthārthī jñānī ca bharatarṣabha //16//
GE07bhg4c07u:700: śrīdharaḥ - sukṛtinas tu māṃ bhajanty eva /
GE07bhg4c07u:701: te sukṛti-tāratamyena catur-vidhā ity āha catur-vidhā iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:702: pūrva-janmasu ye kṛta-puṇyās te māṃ bhajanti /
GE07bhg4c07u:704: ārto vegādy-abhibhūtaḥ sa yadi pūrvaṃ kṛta-puṇyas tarhi māṃ bhajati /
GE07bhg4c07u:708: arthārthī atra vā paratra vā bhoga-sādhana-bhūto 'rtha-lipsuḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:710: madhusūdanaḥ - ye tv āsura-bhāva-rahitāḥ puṇya-karmāṇo vivekinas te puṇya-karma-tāratamyena
GE07bhg4c07u:711: catur-vidhāḥ santo māṃ bhajante krameṇa ca kāmanā-rāhityena mat-prasādān māyāṃ tarantīty
GE07bhg4c07u:713: ye sukṛtinaḥ pūrva-janma-kṛta-puṇya-saṃcayā janāḥ saphala-janmānas ta eva nānye te māṃ bhajante sevante /
GE07bhg4c07u:715: te ca trayaḥ sa-kāmā eko 'kāma ity evaṃ caturvidhāḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:716: ārta ārtyā śatru-vyādhy-ādy-āpadā grastas tan-nivṛttim icchan /
GE07bhg4c07u:717: yathā makha-bhaṅgena kupita indre varṣati vraja-vāsī janaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:723: yathā vā maithilo janakaḥ śrutadevaś ca,
GE07bhg4c07u:725: iha vā paratra vā yad bhogopakaraṇaṃ tal-lipsuḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:729: tatra jijñāsur jñānotpattyā sākṣād eva māyāṃ tarati ārto 'rthārthī ca jijñāsutvaṃ prāpyeti viśeṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:730: ārtasyārthārthinaś ca jijñāsutva-sambhavāj jijñāsoś cārtatva-jñānopakaraṇārthārthitva-sambhavād ubhayor madhye jijñāsur uddiṣṭaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:731: tad ete trayaḥ sa-kāmā vyākhyātāḥ niṣkāmaś caturtha idānīm ucyate jñānī ca /
GE07bhg4c07u:732: jñānaṃ bhagavat-tattva-sākṣātkāras tena nitya-yukto jñānī tīrṇa-māyo nivṛtta-sarva-kāmaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:734: he bharatarṣabha tvam api jijñāsur vā jñānī veti katamo 'haṃ bhakta iti mā śaṅkiṣṭhā ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:735: tatra niṣkāma-bhakto jñānī yathā sanakādir yathā nārado yathā prahlādo yathā pṛthur yathā vā śukaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:736: niṣkāmaḥ śuddha-prema-bhakto yathā gopikādir yathā vākrūra-yudhiṣṭhirādiḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:737: kaṃsa-śiśupālādayas tu bhayād dveṣāc ca santata-bhagavac-cintā-parā api na bhaktā bhagavad-anurakter abhāvāt /
GE07bhg4c07u:738: bhagavad-anurakti-rūpāyās tu bhakteḥ svarūpaṃ sādhanaṃ bhedās tathā bhaktānām api bhagavad-bhakti-rasāyane 'smābhiḥ
GE07bhg4c07u:740: viśvanāthaḥ - tarhi ke tvāṃ bhajanta ity ata āha caturvidhā iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:741: sukṛtaṃ varṇāśramācāra-lakṣaṇo dharmas tadvantaḥ santo māṃ bhajante /
GE07bhg4c07u:750: sarva-dvārāṇi saṃnyasya [Gītā 8.12] ity agrima-granthe yoga-miśrāpi vakṣyate /
GE07bhg4c07u:751: jñāna-karmādy-amiśrā kevalā bhaktir yā sā tu saptamādhyāyārambha eva mayy āsakta-manaḥ pārtha [Gītā 7.1] ity anena uktā
GE07bhg4c07u:752: / punaś cāṣṭame 'py adhyāye ananya-cetāḥ satatam [Gītā 8.14] ity anena,
GE07bhg4c07u:753: navame mahātmānas tu māṃ pārtha [Gītā 9.13] iti śloka-dvayena ananyāś cintayanto mām [Gītā 9.22] ity anena ca nirūpayitavyeti /
GE07bhg4c07u:754: pradhānībhūtā kevalā iti dvividhaiva bhaktir madhyame 'sminn adhyāya-ṣaṭke bhagavatoktā /
GE07bhg4c07u:755: yā tu tṛtīyā guṇībhūtā bhaktiḥ karmaṇi jñānini yogini ca karmādi-phala-siddhy-arthā dṛśyate /
GE07bhg4c07u:757: kintu tatra tatra karmādīnām eva prādhānyāt /
GE07bhg4c07u:758: prādhānyena vyapadeśā bhavanti iti nyāyena karmatva-jñānatva-yogatva-vyapadeśaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:761: phalaṃ ca sakāma-karmaṇaḥ svargo niṣkāma-karmaṇo jñāna-yogo jñāna-yogayor nirvāṇa-mokṣa iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:763: tatra pradhānībhūtāsu bhaktiṣu madhye ārtādiṣu triṣu yāḥ karma-miśrās tisraḥ sa-kāmā bhaktayas tāsāṃ phalaṃ tat-tat-kāma-prāptiḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:766: yad vakṣyate yānti mad-yājino 'pi mām [Gītā 9.25] iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:767: caturthyā jñāna-miśrāyās tata utkṛṣṭāyās tu phalaṃ śānta-ratiḥ sanakādiṣv iva /
GE07bhg4c07u:768: bhakta-bhagavat-kāruṇyādhikya-vaśāt kasyāścit tasyāḥ phalaṃ premotkarṣaś ca śrī-śukādiṣv iva /
GE07bhg4c07u:769: karma-miśrā bhaktir yadi niṣkāmā syāt tadā tasyāḥ phalaṃ jñāna-miśrā bhaktiḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:771: kvacic ca svabhāvād eva dā̆sādi-bhakta-saṅgottha-vāsanā vaśād vā jñāna-karmādi-miśra-bhaktimatām api dāsyādi-premā
GE07bhg4c07u:773: atha jñāna-karmādy-amiśrāyāḥ śuddhāyā ananyākiñcanottamādi-paryāyāḥ bhakter bahu-prabhedāyā
GE07bhg4c07u:774: dāsya-sakhyādi-premavat-pārṣadatvam eva phalam ity ādikaṃ śrī-bhāgavata-ṭīkāyāṃ bahuśaḥ pratipāditam /
GE07bhg4c07u:776: baladevaḥ -- tarhi tvāṃ ke prapadyante tatrāha catur-vidhā iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:777: sukṛtinaḥ supaṇḍitāḥ sva-varṇāśramocita-karmaṇā mad-ekānti-bhāvena ca sampannā janā māṃ bhajante /
GE07bhg4c07u:782: jñānī śeṣatvena svāmtānaṃ śeṣitvena parātmānaṃ ca māṃ jñātavān śukādiḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:785: ārtārthārthinoḥ paratra jijñāsutā-sampattaye tayor antarāle jijñāsor upanyāsaḥ //16//
GE07bhg4c07u:788: priyo hi jñānino 'tyartham ahaṃ sa ca mama priyaḥ //17//
GE07bhg4c07u:789: śrīdharaḥ - teṣāṃ madhye jñānī śreṣṭha ity āha teṣām iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:792: ekasmin mayy eva bhaktir yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:793: jñānino dehādy-abhimānābhāvena citta-vikṣepābhāvān nitya-yuktatvam ekānta-bhaktitvaṃ ca sambhavati /
GE07bhg4c07u:797: tasmād etair nitya-yuktatvādibhiś caturbhir hetubhiḥ sa uttama ity arthaḥ //17//
GE07bhg4c07u:798: madhusūdanaḥ - nanu na māṃ duṣkṛtino mūḍhāḥ prapadyante narādhamā ity anena tad-vilakṣaṇāḥ
GE07bhg4c07u:799: sukṛtino māṃ bhajanta ity arthāt prāpte 'pi teṣāṃ cāturvidhyaṃ catur-vidhā bhajante
GE07bhg4c07u:800: mām ity anena darśitāḥ tatas te sarve sukṛtina eva nirviśeṣād iti cet tatrāha ca /
GE07bhg4c07u:801: caturvidhānām api sukṛtitve niyate 'pi sukṛtādhikyena niṣkāmatayā premādhikyāt tata iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:802: caturvidhānāṃ teṣāṃ madhye jñānī tattva-jñānavān nivṛtta-sarva-kāmo viśiṣyate sarvato 'tiricyate sarvotkṛṣṭa ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:803: yato nitya-yukto bhagavati pratyag-abhinne sadā samāhita-cetā vikṣepakābhāvāt /
GE07bhg4c07u:804: ataevaika-bhaktir ekasmin bhagavaty eva bhaktir anuraktir yasya sa tathā,
GE07bhg4c07u:807: priyo nirupādhi-premāspadam atyartham atyantātiśayena jñānino 'haṃ pratyag-abhinnaḥ paramātmā ca tasmād ayarthaṃ sa mama parameśvarasya priyaḥ
GE07bhg4c07u:808: ātmā priyo 'tiśayena bhavatīti śruti-lokayoḥ prasiddham evety arthaḥ //17//
GE07bhg4c07u:809: viśvanāthaḥ - caturṇāṃ bhakty-adhikāriṇāṃ madhye kaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ ity apekṣāyām āha /
GE07bhg4c07u:811: nitya-yukto nityaṃ mayi yujyata iti saḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:813: ārtādyās trayas tu naivambhūtā iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:814: nanu sarvo 'pi jñānī jñāna-vaiyarthya-bhayāt tvāṃ bhajata eva ?
GE07bhg4c07u:815: tatrāha ekā mukhyā pradhānībhūtaṃ yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:816: yad vā, ekā bhaktir eva tathaivāsaktimattvāt yasya sa nāma-mātreṇaiva jñānīti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:817: evambhūtasya jñānino 'haṃ śyāmasundarākāro 'tyartham atiśayena priyaḥ sādhana-sādhya-daśayoḥ parihātum aśakyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:818: ye yathā māṃ prapadyante [Gītā 4.11] iti nyāyena mamāpi sa priyaḥ //17//
GE07bhg4c07u:819: baladevaḥ - caturṣu jñāninaḥ śraiṣṭhyam āha teṣām iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:823: ārtādeśa tu yāvat-kāmita-prāptir mad-yoga ekasmin mayy eva jñānino bhaktir ārtādes tu sva-kāmite tat-pradātṛtvena mayi cāto jñānī tataḥ śreṣṭhaḥ
GE07bhg4c07u:825: jñānino hy aham atyarthaṃ priyaḥ premāspadam /
GE07bhg4c07u:826: sa hi mat-priyatā-sudhā-sindhu-nimagno nānyat kiñcid anusandhatte tasya mat-priyatā-parimiteti bodhayitum atyartha-śabdaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:827: sarvajño 'nanta-śaktiś cāhaṃ yāṃ vaktuṃ na śaknotīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:828: sa ca jñānī ye yathā mām [Gītā 4.11] ity ādi-nyāyena tathaiva mama priyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:831: udārāḥ sarva evaite jñānī tv ātmaiva me matam /
GE07bhg4c07u:832: āsthitaḥ sa hi yuktātmā mām evānuttamāṃ gatim //18//
GE07bhg4c07u:833: śrīdharaḥ - tarhi kim itare trayas tad-bhaktāḥ saṃsaranti ?
GE07bhg4c07u:834: na hi na hīty āha udārā iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:835: sarve 'py eta udārā mahānto mokṣa-bhāja evety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:836: jñānī tu punar ātmaiveti me mataṃ niścayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:837: hi yasmāt sa jñānī yuktātmā mad-eka-cittaḥ san na vidyata uttamā yasyās tām anuttamāṃ gatiṃ mām evāsthita āśritavān mad-vyatiriktam anyat phalaṃ na manyata ity arthaḥ //18//
GE07bhg4c07u:838: madhusūdanaḥ - tat-kim ārtādayas tava na priyāḥ ?
GE07bhg4c07u:839: na, atyartham iti viśeṣaṇād ity āha udārā iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:840: eta ārtādayaḥ sa-kāmā api mad-bhaktāḥ sarve trayo 'py udārā evotkṛṣṭā eva pūrva-janmārjitāneka-sukṛta-rāśitvāt /
GE07bhg4c07u:841: anyathā hi māṃ na bhajeyur eva /
GE07bhg4c07u:842: ārtasya jijñāsor arthārthinaś ca mad-vimukhasya kṣudra-devatā-bhaktasyāpi bahulam upalambhāt /
GE07bhg4c07u:844: na hi jñānavān ajño vā kaścid api bhakto mamāpriyo bhavati /
GE07bhg4c07u:845: kintu yasya yādṛśī mayi prītir mamāpi tatra tādṛśī prītir iti svabhāva-siddham etat /
GE07bhg4c07u:846: tatra sa-kāmānāṃ trayāṇāṃ kāmyamānam api priyam aham api priyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:848: ataḥ so 'pi mama niratiśaya-prīti-viṣaya iti viśeṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:849: anyathā hi mama kṛtajñatā na syāt kṛtaghnatā ca syāt /
GE07bhg4c07u:852: yathā hi yad eva vidyayā karoti śraddhayopaniṣadā tad eva vīryavattaraṃ bhavati ity atra tarab-arthasya vivakṣitatvād vidyā-divyātirekena kṛtam api karma vīryavad bhavaty eva /
GE07bhg4c07u:853: tathātyarthaṃ jñānī bhakto mama priya ity ukter yo jñāna-vyatirekeṇa bhaktaḥ so 'pi priya iti paryavasyaty eva /
GE07bhg4c07u:855: uktaṃ hi -- ye yathā māṃ prapadyante tāṃs tathaiva bhajāmy aham [Gītā 4.11] iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:857: ātmaiva na matto bhinnaḥ tv aham eva sa iti mama mataṃ niścayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:860: sa jñānī yuktātmā sadā mayi samāhita-cittaḥ san māṃ bhagavantam anantam ānanda-ghanam ātmānam evānuttamāṃ sarvotkṛṣṭāṃ gatiṃ gantavyaṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:862: na tu mad-bhinnaṃ kim api phalaṃ sa manyata ity arthaḥ //18//
GE07bhg4c07u:863: viśvanāthaḥ -- tarhi kim ārtādyās trayas tava na priyās tatra na hi na hīty āha udārā iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:865: mattaḥ kiṃcit kāmitaṃ mayāpi ditsitaṃ gṛhṇanti te bhakta-vatsalāya mahyaṃ bahu-pradāyinaḥ priyā eveti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:866: jñānī tv ātmaiveti sa hi bhajann atha ca mattaḥ kim api svargāpavargādikaṃ nākaṅkṣata iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:867: atas tad-adhīnasya mama sa ātmaiveti mama mataṃ matiḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:868: yataḥ sa māṃ śyāmasundarākāram evānuttamāṃ sarvottamāṃ gatiṃ prāpyāsthitaḥ niścitavān /
GE07bhg4c07u:869: na tu mama nirviśeṣa-svarūpa-brahma-nirvāṇam iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:870: evaṃ ca niṣkāma-pradhānībhūta-bhaktimān jñānī bhakta-vatsalena bhagavatā svātmatvenābhimanyate /
GE07bhg4c07u:871: kevala-bhaktimān ananyas tu ātmano 'py ādhikyena / yad uktaṃ -
GE07bhg4c07u:872: na tathā me priyatama ātma-yonir na śaṅkaraḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:873: na ca saṅkarṣaṇo na śrīr naivātmā ca yathā bhavān // [BhP 11.14.15] iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:874: nāham ātmānam āśāse mad-bhaktaiḥ sādhubhir vinā [BhP 9.4.64] iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:876: baladevaḥ - nanv ārtādayas tava priyā na bhavanti maivam atyartham iti viśeṣaṇād ity āha udārā iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:879: ye māṃ bhajanto mayā ditsitaṃ kiṃcit svābhīṣṭaṃ matto gṛhṇanti te bhakta-vātsalyaṃ mahyaṃ prayacchanto mama bahu-pradāḥ priyā eveti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:881: hi yasmāt sa jī̀iānī yuktātmā mad-arpita-manā matto 'nyat kiṃcid apy anicchann atipriyeṇa
GE07bhg4c07u:882: mayā vinā lavam api sthātum asamartho mām eva sarvottamāṃ matiṃ prāpyam āsthitaḥ
GE07bhg4c07u:883: niścitavān atas tena tādṛśena vinā lavam api sthātum asamarthasya mamātmaiva saḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:884: na ca jñāni-jīvasya hariḥ svenābhedam āheti vācyam /
GE07bhg4c07u:885: jñāna-bhajatvāsiddher bhajatāṃ cāturvidhyāsiddher mokṣe bheda-vākya-vyākopāc ca /
GE07bhg4c07u:888: ātmaiva mana eva matam ity apare //18//
GE07bhg4c07u:890: bahūnāṃ janmanām ante jñānavān māṃ prapadyate /
GE07bhg4c07u:891: vāsudevaḥ sarvam iti sa mahātmā sudurlabhaḥ //19//
GE07bhg4c07u:892: śrīdharaḥ - evambhūto mad-bhakto 'tidurlabha ity āha bahūnām iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:893: bahūnāṃ janmanām kiṃcit kiṃcit puṇyopacayenānte carame janmani jñānavān san sarvam idaṃ carācaraṃ vāsudeva eveti sarvātma-dṛṣṭyā māṃ prapadyate bhajati /
GE07bhg4c07u:895: madhusūdanaḥ - yasmād evaṃ tasmāt bahūnām iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:896: bahūnāṃ janmanāṃ kiṃcit kiṃcit puṇyopacaya-hetūnām ante carame janmani sarva-sukṛta-vipāka-rūpe
GE07bhg4c07u:897: vāsudevaḥ sarvam iti jñānavān san māṃ nirupādhi-premāspadaṃ prapadyate sarvadā samasta-prema-viṣayatvena bhajate /
GE07bhg4c07u:898: sakalam idam ahaṃ ca vāsudeva iti dṛṣṭyā sarva-premṇāṃ mayy eva paryavasāyitvāt /
GE07bhg4c07u:899: ataḥ sa evaṃ-jñāna-pūrvaka-mad-bhaktimān mahātmātyanta-śuddhāntaḥkaraṇatvāj jīvanmuktaḥ sarvotkṛṣṭo na tat-samo 'nyo 'sti adhikas tu nāsty eva
GE07bhg4c07u:900: ataḥ sudurlabho manuṣyāṇāṃ sahasreṣu duḥkhenāpi labdhum aśakyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:901: ataḥ sa niratiśaya-mat-prīti-viṣaya iti yuktam evety arthaḥ //19//
GE07bhg4c07u:902: viśvanāthaḥ - nanu mām evānuttamāṃ gatim āsthita iti brūṣe ataḥ sa jñāni-bhaktas tvām eva prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c07u:903: kintu kiyataḥ samayād anantaraṃ sa jñānī bhakty-adhikārī bhavatīty ata āha bahūnām iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:904: vāsudevaḥ sarvam iti sarvatra vāsudeva-darśī jñānavān bahūnāṃ janmanām ante māṃ prapadyate /
GE07bhg4c07u:906: sa ca jñānī bhakto mahātmā susthira-cittaḥ sudurlabhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:908: aikāntika-bhaktas tu kim uteti sa tv atisudurlabha eveti bhāvaḥ //19//
GE07bhg4c07u:909: baladevaḥ - nanv ārtādīnām ante kā niṣṭheti cet tatrāha bahūnām iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:910: ārtādis trividho mad-bhaktaḥ kṛta-mad-bhakti-mahimnā bahūni janmāny uttamān viṣayānandān
GE07bhg4c07u:911: anubhūya teṣu vitṛṣṇo 'nte janmani mat-svarūpa-jña-sat-prasaṅgāt jñānavān prāpta-mat-svarūpa-jñānaḥ
GE07bhg4c07u:917: yad dhi yad adhīna-svarūpa-sthitikatvāt prāṇa-rūpaṃ vāg-ādi-vyapadiṣṭaṃ chāndogye
GE07bhg4c07u:918: na vai vāco na cakṣūṃṣi na śrotrāṇi na manāṃsīty ācakṣate prāṇā ity evācakṣate prāṇo
GE07bhg4c07u:920: [ChāU 5.1.15] iti tatrāhuḥ sarvaṃ vastu vāsudevena vyāpyam ataḥ sarvaṃ vāsudeva ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:923: sa hi nikhila-spṛhā-nivṛtti-pūrvakaṃ mat-spṛho mad-ātmāty-udāra-manā man-niveditātmā jñāni-koṭiṣv api sudurlabhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:924: eṣa jñānavān priyo hi jñānino 'tyartham [Gītā 7.17] ity ādy-ukta-lakṣaṇo bodhyaḥ //19//
GE07bhg4c07u:927: taṃ taṃ niyamam āsthāya prakṛtyā niyatāḥ svayā //20//
GE07bhg4c07u:928: śrīdharaḥ -tad evaṃ kāmino 'pi santaḥ kāma-prāptaye parameśvaram eva ye bhajanti te kāmān prāpya śanair mucyanta ity uktam /
GE07bhg4c07u:929: ye tv atyantaṃ rājasās tāmasāś ca kāmābhibhūtāḥ kṣudra-devatāḥ sevante te saṃsarantīty āha kāmair iti caturbhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:930: ye tu tais taiḥ putra-kīrti-śatru-jayādi-viṣayaiḥ kāmair apahṛta-vivekā santo 'nyāḥ kṣudrā bhūta-preta-yakṣādyā devatā bhajanti /
GE07bhg4c07u:931: kiṃ kṛtvā ? tat-tad-devatārādhane yo yo niyama upavāsādi-lakṣaṇas taṃ taṃ niyamaṃ svīkṛtya /
GE07bhg4c07u:932: tatrāpi svayā svīyayā prakṛtyā pūrvābhyāsa-vāsanayā niyatā vaśīkṛtāḥ santaḥ //20//
GE07bhg4c07u:934: labdhum aśakyatvenābhimatais tais taiḥ kṣudraiḥ kāmair abhilāṣair hṛtam apahṛtaṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:936: nītaṃ jñānam antaḥ-karaṇaṃ yeṣāṃ te 'nya-devatā bhagavato vāsudevād anyāḥ kṣudra-devatās
GE07bhg4c07u:937: taṃ taṃ niyamaṃ japopavāsa-pradakṣiṇā-namaskārādi-rūpaṃ tat-tad-devatārādhane prasiddhaṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:939: kṣudra-devatā-madhye 'pi kecit kāṃcid eva bhajante svayā prakṛtyā niyatā asādhāraṇayā pūrvābhyāsa-vāsanayā vaśīkṛtā santaḥ //20//
GE07bhg4c07u:940: viśvanāthaḥ - nanu ārtādayaḥ sa-kāmā api bhagavantaṃ tvāṃ bhajantaḥ kṛtārthā iva ity avagatam /
GE07bhg4c07u:941: ye tu ārtādayaḥ ārti-hānādi-kāmanayā devatāntaraṃ bhajante /
GE07bhg4c07u:942: teṣāṃ kā gatir ity apekṣāyām āha kāmair iti caturbhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:943: hṛta-jñānā iti rogādy-ārti-harāḥ śīghraṃ yathā sūryādayas tathā na viṣṇur iti naṣṭa-buddhayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:944: prakṛtyeti svayā prakṛtyā niyatā vaśīkṛtāḥ santas teṣāṃ duṣṭā prakṛtir eva mat-prapattau parāṅmukhīti bhāvaḥ //20//
GE07bhg4c07u:945: baladevaḥ - tad itthaṃ kāmanayāpi māṃ bhajanto mad-bhakti-mahimnā te vimucyanta ity uktam /
GE07bhg4c07u:946: ye tu śīghra-sukha-kāmā devatāntara-bhaktās te saṃsaranty evety āha kāmair ity ādibhiś caturbhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:947: tais tair ārti-vināśādi-viṣayakaiḥ kāmair hṛta-jñānā yathādityādayaḥ śīghram eva roga-vināśādikarās tathā na viṣṇur iti naṣṭa-dhiya ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c07u:948: taṃ tam asādhāraṇaṃ svayā prakṛtyā vāsanayā niyatā niyantritās teṣāṃ prakṛtir eva tādṛśī yā mat-prapattau vaimukhyaṃ karotīti bhāvaḥ //20//
GE07bhg4c07u:950: yo yo yāṃ yāṃ tanuṃ bhaktaḥ śraddhayārcitum icchati /
GE07bhg4c07u:951: tasya tasyācalāṃ śraddhāṃ tām eva vidadhāmy aham //21//
GE07bhg4c07u:952: śrīdharaḥ - devatā-viśeṣaṃ ye bhajanti teṣāṃ madhye yo ya iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:953: yo yo bhakto yāṃ yāṃ tanuṃ devatā-rūpāṃ madīyām eva mūrtiṃ śraddhayārcitum icchati
GE07bhg4c07u:954: pravartate tasya tasya bhaktasya tat-tan-mūrti-viṣayāṃ tām eva śraddhām acalāṃ dṛḍhām
GE07bhg4c07u:956: madhusūdanaḥ - tat tad devatā-prasādāt teṣām api sarveśvare bhagavati vāsudeve bhaktir bhaviṣyatīti na śaṅkanīyaṃ,
GE07bhg4c07u:958: teṣāṃ madhye yo yaḥ kāmī yāṃ yāṃ tanuṃ devatā-mūrtiṃ śraddhayā janmāntara-vāsanābala-prādurbhūtayā bhaktyā saṃyuktaḥ sann arcitum arcayitum icchati pravartate /
GE07bhg4c07u:960: tasya tasya kāminas tām eva devatā-tanuṃ prati śraddhāṃ pūrva-vāsanāvaśāt prāptāṃ bhaktim acalāṃ sthirāṃ viddadhāmi karomy aham antaryāmī,
GE07bhg4c07u:961: na tu mad-viṣayāṃ śraddhāṃ tasya tasya karomīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:962: tām eva śraddhām iti vyākhyāne yac-chabdānanvayaḥ spaṣṭas tasmāt pratiśabdam adhyāhṛtya vyākhyātam //21//
GE07bhg4c07u:963: viśvanāthaḥ - te te devāḥ pūjāṃ prāpya prasannās teṣāṃ sva-sva-pūjakānāṃ hitārthaṃ tvad-bhaktau śraddhām utpādayiṣyantīti mā vādīḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:964: yatas te devāḥ sva-bhaktāv api śraddhām utpādayitum aśaktāḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:965: kiṃ punar mad-bhaktāv ity āha yo ya iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:966: yāṃ yāṃ tanuṃ sūryādi-deva-rūpāṃ madīyāṃ mūrtiṃ vibhūtim arcitum pūjayituṃ tām eva tat-tad-devatā-viṣayām eva,
GE07bhg4c07u:967: na tu sva-viṣayāṃ śraddhām aham antaryāmy eva vidadhāmi,
GE07bhg4c07u:969: baladevaḥ - sarvāntaryāmī mahā-vibhūtiḥ sarva-hitecchur aham eva tat-tad-devatāsu śraddhām utpādya tāḥ pūjayitvā tat-tad-anurūpāṇi phalāni prayacchāmi,
GE07bhg4c07u:970: na tu tāsāṃ tatra tatra śaktir astīty āśayavān āha ya iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c07u:971: yo ya ārtādi-bhakto yāṃ yām ādiyādi-rūpāṃ mat-tanuṃ śraddhayārcituṃ vāñchati /
GE07bhg4c07u:972: tasya tasya tām eva tat-tad-devatā-viṣayām eva,
GE07bhg4c07u:977: śrutiś ca tat-tad-devatānāṃ mat-tanutvam āha ya āditye tiṣṭhaty ādityād antaro yamādityo na veda yasyādityaḥ śarīram [BAU 3.7.9] ity ādyā //21//
GE07bhg4c07u:979: sa tayā śraddhayā yuktas tasyā rādhanam īhate /
GE07bhg4c07u:980: labhate ca tataḥ kāmān mayaiva vihitān hi tān //22//
GE07bhg4c07u:982: sa bhaktas tayā dṛḍhayā śraddhayā tasyās tano rādhanm ārādhanam īhate karoti /
GE07bhg4c07u:983: tataś ca ye saṅkalpitāḥ kāmās tān kāmāṃs tato devatā-viśeṣāl labhate /
GE07bhg4c07u:984: kintu mayaiva tat-tad-devatāntaryāminā vihitān nirmitān hi /
GE07bhg4c07u:985: sphuṭam etat tat-tad-devatānām api mad-adhīnatvān man-mūrtitvāc cety arthaḥ //22//
GE07bhg4c07u:986: madhusūdanaḥ - sa kāmī tayā mad-vihitayā sthirayā śraddhayā yuktas tasyā devatā-tanvā rādhanam ārādhanaṃ pūrajam īhate nirvartayati /
GE07bhg4c07u:989: labhate ca tatas tasyā devatā-tanvāḥ sakāśāt kāmānīpsitāṃs tān pūrva-saṅkalpitān hi prasiddham /
GE07bhg4c07u:990: mayaiva sarvajñena sarva-karma-phala-dāyinā tat-tad-devatāntaryāmiṇā vihitāṃs tat-tat-phala-vipāka-samaye nirmitān /
GE07bhg4c07u:995: na ca te te kāmā api tais tair devaiḥ pūrṇāḥ kartuṃ śakyanta ity āha mayaiva vihitān pūrṇīkṛtān //22//
GE07bhg4c07u:1001: yadyapi tasya tasyārādhakasya tathā jñānaṃ nāsti tathāpi mat-tanu-viṣayeyaṃ śraddhety anusandhāyāhaṃ phalāny arpayāmīti bhāvaḥ //22//
GE07bhg4c07u:1003: antavat tu phalaṃ teṣāṃ tad bhavaty alpa-medhasām /
GE07bhg4c07u:1004: devān deva-yajo yānti mad-bhaktā yānti mām api //23//
GE07bhg4c07u:1005: śrīdharaḥ - tad evaṃ yadyapi sarvā api devatāḥ sarvātmano mamaiva tanavaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1006: atas tad-ārādhanam api vastuto mad-ārādhanam eva /
GE07bhg4c07u:1008: tathāpi sākṣān-mad-bhaktānāṃ teṣāṃ ca phala-vaiṣamyaṃ bhavatīty āha antavad iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1009: alpa-medhasāṃ paricchanna-dṛṣṭīnāṃ mayā dattam api tat-phalam antavad vināśi bhavati /
GE07bhg4c07u:1012: mad-bhaktās tu mām anādy-anantaṃ paramānandaṃ prāpnuvanti //23//
GE07bhg4c07u:1013: madhusūdanaḥ - yadyapi sarvā api devatāḥ sarvātmano mamaiva tanavas tad-ārādhanam api vastuto mad-ārādhanam eva sarvatrāpi ca phala-dātāntaryāmy aham eva,
GE07bhg4c07u:1014: tathāpi sākṣān-mad-bhaktānāṃ ca teṣāṃ ca vastu-vivekāviveka-kṛtaṃ phala-vaiṣamyaṃ bhavatīty āha antavad iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1016: tan mayā vihitam api tat-tad-devatārādhanajaṃ phalam antavad eva vināśy eva na tu
GE07bhg4c07u:1017: mad-bhaktānāṃ vivekinām ivānantaṃ phalaṃ teṣām ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1018: kutaḥ ? evaṃ yato devān indrādīn antavata eva deva-yajo mad-anya-devatārādhana-parā yānti prāpnuvanti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1019: mad-bhaktās tu trayaḥ sa-kāmāḥ prathamaṃ mat-prasādād abhīṣṭān kāmān prāpnuvanti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1020: api-śabda-prayogāt tato mad-upāsanā-paripākān mām anantam ānanda-ghanam
GE07bhg4c07u:1022: ataḥ samāne 'pi sakāmatve mad-bhaktānām anya-devatā-bhaktānāṃ ca mahad-antaram /
GE07bhg4c07u:1023: tasmāt sādhūktam udārāḥ sarva evaita iti //23//
GE07bhg4c07u:1024: viśvanāthaḥ - kintu teṣāṃ devatāntara-bhaktānām phalaṃ tat-tad-devatārādhana-janyam antavat naśvaraṃ kaiñcitkālikaṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c07u:1025: nanu ārādhane śrame tulyo 'pi devatāntara-bhaktānāṃ phalaṃ naśvaraṃ karoṣi,
GE07bhg4c07u:1026: sva-bhaktānāṃ tv anaśvaraṃ karoṣīti tvayi parameśvare 'yam anyāyas tatra nāyam anyāya ity āha deva-yajo deva-pūjakā devān eva yānti prāpnuvanti
GE07bhg4c07u:1029: ye hi yat-pūjakās te tān prāpnuvanty eveti nyāya eva /
GE07bhg4c07u:1030: tatra yadi devā api naśvarās tadā tad-bhaktāḥ katham anaśvarā bhavantu /
GE07bhg4c07u:1031: kathantarāṃ yā tad bhajana-phalaṃ vā na naśyatu /
GE07bhg4c07u:1033: bhagavāṃs tu nityas tad-bhaktā api nityās tad-bhakti-bhakti-phalaṃ ca sarvaṃ nityam eveti //23//
GE07bhg4c07u:1034: baladevaḥ - nanu devāś cet tvat-tanavas tarhi deva-bhaktānāṃ tad-bhaktānāṃ ca samānaṃ phalaṃ syād iti cet tatrāha antavad iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1036: na tu mat-tanuvudbhyārādhayatāṃ tat-tat-phalam alpam antavad vināśi ca bhavati,
GE07bhg4c07u:1037: mat-tanuvudbhyārādhayatāṃ tu phalam anantam avināśi ceti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1038: yasmād ādityādi-deva-yājinas tān svejyān mita-bhogān mitāyuṣo yāntīti,
GE07bhg4c07u:1039: mad-bhaktās tu mām eva nityāparimita-svarūpa-guṇa-vibhūti-mad-ārādhana-phalam anantam avināśi ceit mahad-antaram ity arthaḥ //23//
GE07bhg4c07u:1041: avyaktaṃ vyaktim āpannaṃ manyante mām abuddhayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1043: śrīdharaḥ - nau ca samāne prayāse mahati ca phala-viśeṣe sati sarve 'pi kim iti devatāntaraṃ hitvā tvām eva na bhajanti ?
GE07bhg4c07u:1045: avyaktaṃ prapañcātītaṃ māṃ vyaktiṃ manuṣya-matsya-kūrmādi-bhāvaṃ prāptam alpa-buddhayo manyante /
GE07bhg4c07u:1046: tatra hetuḥ -- mama paraṃ bhāvaṃ svarūpam ajānantaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1049: na vidyata uttamo bhāvo yasmāt tat mad-bhāvam /
GE07bhg4c07u:1051: ca sva-karma-nirmita-bhautika-dehaṃ ca devatāntaraṃ samaṃ paśyanto manda-matayo māṃ nātīvādriyante /
GE07bhg4c07u:1054: madhusūdanaḥ - evaṃ bhagavad-bhajanasya sarvottama-phalatve 'pi kathaṃ prāyeṇa prāṇino bhagavad-vimukhyā ity atra hetum āha bhagavān avyaktam iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1055: avyaktaṃ deha-grahaṇāt prāk-kāryākṣamatvena sthitam idānīṃ vasudeva-gṛhe vyaktiṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:1056: bhautika-dehāvacchedena kārya-kṣamatāṃ prāptaṃ kaṃcij jīvam eva manyante mām īśvaram
GE07bhg4c07u:1058: avyaktaṃ sarva-kāraṇam api māṃ vyaktiṃ kārya-rūpatāṃ matsya-kūrmādy-anekāvatāra-rūpeṇa prāptam iti vā /
GE07bhg4c07u:1059: kathaṃ te jīvās tvāṃ na viviñcanti ?
GE07bhg4c07u:1061: paraṃ sarva-kāraṇa-rūpam avyayaṃ nityaṃ mama bhāvaṃ svarūpaṃ sopādhikam ajānantas
GE07bhg4c07u:1062: tathā nirupādhikam apy anuttamaṃ sarvotkṛṣṭam anatiśayādvitīya-paramānanda-ghanam
GE07bhg4c07u:1063: anantaṃ mama svarūpam ajānanto jīvānukāri-kārya-darśanāj jīvam eva kaṃcin māṃ manyante /
GE07bhg4c07u:1064: tato mām anīśvaratvenābhimataṃ vihāya prasiddhaṃ devatāntaram eva bhajante /
GE07bhg4c07u:1065: tataś cāntavad eva phalaṃ prāpnuvantīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1066: agre ca vakṣyate avajānanti māṃ mūḍhā mānuṣīṃ tanum āśritam [Gītā 9.11] iti //24//
GE07bhg4c07u:1067: viśvanāthaḥ - devatāntara-bhaktānām alpa-medhasāṃ vārtā dūre tāvad āstām /
GE07bhg4c07u:1074: ato mad-bhaktān vinā mat-tattva-jñāne sarvatra vālpa-buddhaya ity āha avyaktaṃ prapañcātītaṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:1075: nirākāraṃ brahmaiva māṃ māyikākāratvenaiva vyaktiṃ vasudeva-gṛhe janma prāptaṃ nirbuddhayo
GE07bhg4c07u:1077: yato mama paraṃ bhāvaṃ māyātītaṃ svarūpaṃ janma-karma-līlādikam ajānantaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1082: bhagavat-svarūpa-guṇa-janma-karma-līlānām anādy-antatvena nityatvaṃ śrī-rūpa-gosvāmi-caraṇair bhāgavatāmṛta-granthe pratipāditam /
GE07bhg4c07u:1083: mama paraṃ bhāvaṃ svarūpam avyayaṃ nityam viśuddhorjita-sattva-mūrtṃ iti svāmi-caraṇaiś coktam //24//
GE07bhg4c07u:1084: baladevaḥ - atha kā vārtā mad-anya-deva-yājinām alpa-medhasām upaniṣan-niṣṇātānām api mad-bhakti-riktānāṃ mat-tattva-dhīr na syād ity āśayenāha avyaktam iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1085: abuddhayo mat-tattva-yāthātmya-buddhi-śūnyā janā avyaktaṃ sva-prakāśātma-vigrahatvād indriyāviṣayaṃ māṃ vyaktim āpannaṃ tad-viṣayāṃ manyante
GE07bhg4c07u:1086: devakyāṃ vasudevāt sattvotkṛṣṭena karmaṇā sañjātam itara-rāja-putra-tulyaṃ māṃ vadanti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1087: yatas te mad-abhijña-sat-prasaṅgābhāvān mama bhāvaṃ param avyayam anuttamam ajānantaḥ -
GE07bhg4c07u:1091: mad-bhakti-hīnās te mama svarūpa-guṇa-janma-līlādi-lakṣaṇa-bhāvaṃ māyāditaḥ paramato 'vyayaṃ nityam anuttamaṃ sarvottamaṃ na,
GE07bhg4c07u:1092: kintv anyavan māyikam anityaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ ca gṛhṇanta ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1093: svarūpaṃ harer vijñānānandaika-rasaṃ vijñānam ānandaṃ brahma ity ādeḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1094: sārvajñādi-guṇa-gaṇas tasya svarūpānubandhī ananta-kalyāṇa-guṇātmako 'sau ity ādeḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1095: abhivyakti-mātraṃ janma ajo 'pi san ity ādeḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1097: na śakyaḥ sa tvayā draṣṭum asmābhir vā bṛhaspate /
GE07bhg4c07u:1098: yasya prasādaṃ kurute sa vai taṃ draṣṭum arhati // ity ādeḥ //24//
GE07bhg4c07u:1101: mūḍho 'yaṃ nābhijānāti loko mām ajam avyayam //25//
GE07bhg4c07u:1102: śrīdharaḥ - teṣāṃ svājñāne hetum āha nāham iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1103: sarvasya lokasya nāhaṃ prakāśaḥ prakaṭo na bhavāmi /
GE07bhg4c07u:1106: yogo yuktir madīyaḥ ko 'py acintyaḥ prajñā-vilāsaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1108: tayā saṃcchannaḥ ataeva mat-svarūpa-jñāne mūḍhaḥ sann ayaṃ loko 'jam avyayaṃ ca māṃ na jānātīti //25//
GE07bhg4c07u:1109: madhusūdanaḥ - nanu janma-kāle 'pi sarva-yogi-dhyeyaṃ śrī-vaikuṇṭha-stham aiśvaram
GE07bhg4c07u:1118: manuṣa-buddhir jīva-buddhir vety arjunāśaṅkām apaninīṣur āha bhagavān nāham iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1119: ahaṃ sarvasya lokasya na prakāśaḥ svena rūpeṇa prakaṭo na bhavāmi /
GE07bhg4c07u:1120: kintu keṣāṃcin mad-bhaktānām prakaṭo bhavāmīty abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1121: kathaṃ sarvasya lokasya na prakaṭa ity atra hetum āha yoga-māyā-samāvṛtaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1122: yogo mama saṅkalpas tad-vaśa-vartinī māyā yoga-māyā tathāyam abhakto jano māṃ svarūpeṇa
GE07bhg4c07u:1123: na jānātv iti saṅkalpānuvidhāyinyā māyayā samyag āvṛtaḥ saty api jñāna-kāraṇe jñāna-viṣayatvāyogyaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1124: ato yad uktaṃ paraṃ bhāvam ajānanta iti tatra mama saṅkalpa eva kāraṇam ity uktaṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c07u:1125: ato mama māyayā mūḍha āvṛta-jñānaḥ sann ayaṃ caturvidha-bhakta-vilakṣaṇo lokaḥ saty api jñāna-kāraṇe mām ajam avyayam anādy-anantaṃ parameśvaraṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:1126: kintu viparīta-dṛṣṭyā manuṣyam eva kaṃcin manyata ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1128: āvṛṇoty avidyamānaṃ ca kiṃcid darśayatīti laukika-māyām api prasiddham etat //25//
GE07bhg4c07u:1130: tadā te tathābhūtā sārvakālikī sthitiḥ kathaṃ na dṛśyate?
GE07bhg4c07u:1132: ahaṃ sarvasya sarva-deśa-kāla-vartino janasya na prakāśo na prakaṭaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1133: yathā guṇa-līlā-parikaravattvena sadaiva virājamāno 'pi dadācid eva keṣucid eva bhramāṇḍeṣu /
GE07bhg4c07u:1134: kiṃ ca sūryo yathā sumeru-śailāvaraṇa-vaśāt sarvadā loka-dṛśyo na bhavati,
GE07bhg4c07u:1137: na ca jyotiścakravartamānānāṃ prāṇināṃ jyotiścakrastho jyotiścakra-madhye sāmastyena sadaiva virājamāno 'pi sūryaḥ sarva-kāla-deśa-varti-janasya na prakaṭaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1138: kintu kādācitkeṣu ca bhāratādiṣu khaṇḍeṣu vartamānasya janasyaiva tathaivāham api /
GE07bhg4c07u:1139: sva-dhāmasu svarūpa-sūryo yathā sadaiva dṛśyas tathaiva śrī-kṛṣṇa-dhāmani mathurā-dvārakādau sthitānām idānīntanānāṃ janānāṃ tatrasthaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kathaṃ na dṛśyo bhavati ?
GE07bhg4c07u:1140: ucyate yadi jyotiścakra-madhye sumerur abhaviṣyat tadā tad-āvṛtaḥ sūryo dṛśyo nābhaviṣyat /
GE07bhg4c07u:1141: tatra tu mathurādi-kṛṣṇa-dyumaṇi-dhāmani sumeru-sthānīyā yoga-māyaiva sadā vartata ity atas tad-āvṛtaḥ kṛṣṇārkaḥ sadā na dṛśyate /
GE07bhg4c07u:1143: ato mūḍho loko māṃ śyāmasundarākāraṃ vasudevātmajam avyayaṃ māyika-janmādi-śūnyaṃ nābhijānāti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1144: ataeva kalyāṇa-guṇa-vāridhiṃ mām apy antatas tyaktvā man-nirviśeṣ-svarūpaṃ brahmaiva upāsata iti //25//
GE07bhg4c07u:1145: baladevaḥ - nanu bhaktā ivābhaktāś ca tvāṃ pratyakṣīkurvanti prasādād eva bhajatsv abhivyaktir iti katham ?
GE07bhg4c07u:1149: yad ahaṃ yogamāyayā samāvṛto mad-vimukha-vyāmohakatva-yoga-yuktayā māyayā samācchanna-parisara ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1151: māyā-mūḍho 'yaṃ loko 'timānuṣa-daivata-prabhāvaṃ vidhi-rudrādi-vanditam api māṃ nābhijānāti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1152: kīdṛśam ? ajaṃ janma-śūnyaṃ yato 'vyayam apracyuta-svarūpa-sāmarthya-sārvajñyādikam ity arthaḥ //25//
GE07bhg4c07u:1155: bhaviṣyāṇi ca bhūtāni māṃ tu veda na kaścana //26//
GE07bhg4c07u:1157: tad eva svasya sarvottamatvam anāvṛta-jñāna-śaktitvena darśayann anyeṣām ajñānam āha vedāham iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1158: samātītāni vinaṣṭāni vartamānāni ca bhaviṣyāṇi bhāvini ca trikāla-vartīni bhūtāni sthāvara-jaṅgamāni sarvāny ahaṃ veda jānāmi /
GE07bhg4c07u:1161: māṃ tu ke 'pi na vetti man-māyā-mohitatvāt /
GE07bhg4c07u:1162: prasiddhaṃ hi loke māyāyāḥ svāśrayādhīnatvam anya-mohakatvaṃ ceti //26//
GE07bhg4c07u:1163: madhusūdanaḥ - ato māyayā svādhīnayā sarva-vyāmohakatvāt svayaṃ cāpratibaddha-jñānatvād āha vedāham iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1164: aham apratibaddha-sarva-vijñāto māyayā sarvān lokān mohayann api samātītāni cira-vinaṣṭāni vartamānāni ca bhaviṣyāṇi ca /
GE07bhg4c07u:1165: evaṃ kāla-traya-vartīni bhūtāni sthāvara-jaṅgamāni sarvāny veda jānāmi /
GE07bhg4c07u:1167: ato 'haṃ sarva-jñaḥ parameśvara ity atra nāsti saṃśaya ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1170: māṃ sarva-darśinam api māyāvinam iva tan-māyā-mohitaḥ kaścana ko 'pi mad-anugraha-bhājanaṃ mad-bhaktaṃ vinā na veda man-māyā-mohitatvāt /
GE07bhg4c07u:1171: ato mat-tattva-vedanābhāvād eva prāyeṇa prāṇino māṃ na bhajanta ity abhiprāyaḥ //26//
GE07bhg4c07u:1172: viśvanāthaḥ - kiṃ ca māyāyāḥ svāśraya-vyāmohakatvābhāvād bahiraṅgā māyā /
GE07bhg4c07u:1173: antaraṅgā yoga-māyā ca mama jñānaṃ nāvṛṇotīty āha vedāham iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1174: māṃ tu kaścana prākṛto 'prākṛtaś ca loko mahā-rudrādir mahā-sarvajño 'pi na kārtsnyena veda,
GE07bhg4c07u:1175: yathāyogaṃ māyayā yoga-māyayā ca jñānāvaraṇād iti bhāvaḥ // //26//
GE07bhg4c07u:1176: baladevaḥ - nanu māyāvṛtatvāt tava jīvavad ajñatāpattir iti cet tatrāha vedāham iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1177: na hi mad-adhīnayā mat-tejasābhibhūtayā dūrato javanikayaiva māṃ sevamānayā māyayā mama kācid vikṛtir ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1178: māṃ tu vedeti maj-jñānī koṭiṣv api sudurlabha ity arthaḥ //26//
GE07bhg4c07u:1182: śrīdharaḥ - tad evaṃ māyā-viṣayatvena jīvānāṃ parameśvarājñānam uktam /
GE07bhg4c07u:1187: tābhyāṃ samutthaḥ samudbhūto yaḥ śītoṣṇa-sukha-duḥkhādi-dvandva-nimitto moho viveka-bhraṃśaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1189: aham eva sukhī duḥkhī ceti gāḍhataram abhiniveśaṃ prāpnuvanti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1190: atas tāni maj-jñānābhāvān māṃ na bhajantīti bhāvaḥ //27//
GE07bhg4c07u:1191: madhusūdanaḥ - yoga-māyāṃ bhagavat-tattva-vijñāna-pratibandhe dehendriya-saṃghātābhimānātiśaya-pūrvakaṃ bhogābhiniveśaṃ hetv-antaram āha iccheti
GE07bhg4c07u:1193: mohenāhaṃ sukhy ahaṃ duḥkhīty ādi-viparyayeṇa sarvāṇy api bhūtāni saṃmohaṃ vivekāyogyatvaṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:1197: iti sambodhana-dvayasya kula-mahimnā svarūpa-śaktyā ca tvāṃ dvandva-mohākhyaḥ śatrur nābhibhavitum alam iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1198: na hīcchā-dveṣa-rahitaṃ kiṃcid api bhūtam asti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1199: na ca tābhyām āviṣṭasya bahir viṣayam api jñānaṃ sambhavati,
GE07bhg4c07u:1201: ato rāga-dveṣa-vyākulāntaḥ-karaṇatvāt sarvāṇy api bhūtāni māṃ parameśvaram ātma-bhūtaṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:1202: na jānanti / ato na bhajante bhajanīyam api //27//
GE07bhg4c07u:1203: viśvanāthaḥ - tan-māyayā jīvāḥ kadārabhya muhyantīty apekṣāyām āha iccheti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1204: sarge jagat-sṛṣṭy-ārambha-kāle sarva-bhūtāni sarve jīvāḥ sammohayanti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1205: kena ? prācīna-karmodbuddhau yāv icchā-dveṣau indriyāṇām anukūle viṣaye icchābhilāṣaḥ
GE07bhg4c07u:1206: pratikūle dveṣaḥ tābhyāṃ samutthaḥ samudbhūto yo dvandvo mānāpamānayoḥ śītoṣṇādyāḥ
GE07bhg4c07u:1207: sukha-duḥkhayoḥ strī-puṃsayor mohaḥ - ahaṃ sammānitaḥ sukhī,
GE07bhg4c07u:1210: mamāyaṃ purusaḥ ity ādyākāraka āvidyako yo mohas tena saṃmohaṃ strī-putrādiṣv atyantāsaktiṃ prāpnuvanti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1213: yadṛcchayā mat-kathādau jāta-śraddhas tu yaḥ pumān /
GE07bhg4c07u:1214: na nirviṇṇo nāti-sakto bhakti-yogo 'sya siddhi-daḥ // [BhP 11.20.8] iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1215: baladevaḥ - tvaj-jñānī kutaḥ sudurlabhas tatrāha iccheti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1216: sarge svotpatti-kāle eva sarva-bhūtāni saṃmohaṃ yānti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1218: mānāpamānayoḥ sukha-duḥkhayoḥ strī-puruṣayor dvandvair yo mohaḥ sat-kṛto 'haṃ sukhī
GE07bhg4c07u:1219: syām asat-kṛtas tu duḥkhī mameyaṃ patnī mamāyaṃ patir ity evam abhiniveśa-lakṣaṇas tenety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1220: kīdṛśenety āha iccheti pūrva-janmani yatra yatra yāv icchā-dveṣāv abhūtāṃ tābhyāṃ saṃskārātmanā sthitābhyāṃ samuttiṣṭhati para-janmani tatra tatrotpadyata ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1222: evaṃ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ saṃmūḍhatvān maj-jñānī sudurlabhaḥ //27//
GE07bhg4c07u:1224: yeṣāṃ tv anta-gataṃ pāpaṃ janānāṃ puṇya-karmaṇām /
GE07bhg4c07u:1226: śrīdharaḥ - kutas tarhi kecana tvāṃ bhajanto dṛśyante ?
GE07bhg4c07u:1228: yeṣāṃ tu puṇya-caraṇa-śīlānāṃ sarva-pratibandhakaṃ pāpam anta-gataṃ naṣṭaṃ te dvandva-nimittena mohena nirmuktā dṛḍha-vratā ekāntinaḥ santo bhajante //28//
GE07bhg4c07u:1230: kathaṃ tarhi catur-vidhā bhajante mām ity uktam ?
GE07bhg4c07u:1231: satyaṃ, sukṛtātiśayena teṣāṃ kṣīṇa-pāpatvād ity āha yeṣām iti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1232: yeṣāṃ tv itara-loka-vilakṣaṇānāṃ janānāṃ saphala-janmanāṃ puṇya-karmaṇām aneka-janmasu
GE07bhg4c07u:1233: puṇyācaraṇa-śīlānāṃ tais taiḥ puṇyaiḥ karmabhir jñāna-pratibandhakaṃ pāpam antagatam
GE07bhg4c07u:1234: antam avasānaṃ prāptaṃ te pāpābhāvena tan-nimittena dvandva-mohena rāga-dveṣādi-nibandhana-viparyāsena
GE07bhg4c07u:1235: svata eva nirmuktāḥ punar āvṛtty-ayogyatvena tyaktā dṛḍha-vratā acālya-saṃkalpāḥ
GE07bhg4c07u:1236: sarvathā bhagavān eva bhajnīyaḥ sa caivaṃ-rūpa eveti pramāṇa-janitāprāmāṇya-śaṅkā-śūnya-vijñānāḥ
GE07bhg4c07u:1237: santo māṃ paramātmānaṃ bhajante 'nanya-śaraṇāḥ santaḥ sevante etādṛśā eva catur-vidhā bhajante
GE07bhg4c07u:1240: teṣāṃ madhye ye sukṛtinas te saṃmoha-śūnyā māṃ bhajanta ity apavāda iti na virodhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1241: ayam evotsargaḥ prāg api pratipāditas tribhir guṇamayair bhāvair ity atra /
GE07bhg4c07u:1242: tasmāt sarttva-śodhaka-puṇya-karma-saṃcāya sarvadā yatanīyam iti bhāvaḥ //28//
GE07bhg4c07u:1243: viśvanāthaḥ -- tarhi keṣāṃ bhaktāv adhikāra ity ata āha yeṣāṃ puṇya-karmaṇāṃ pāpaṃ tvaṃ tu gatam anta-kālaṃ prāntaṃ naśyad-avasthaṃ,
GE07bhg4c07u:1244: na tu samyak naṣṭam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1247: moha-hrāse sati te khalu atyāsakti-rahitā yādṛcchika-mad-bhakta-saṅgena bhajante mātram /
GE07bhg4c07u:1248: ye tu bhajanādy-abhyāsataḥ samyak naṣṭa-pāpās te mohena niḥśeṣeṇa muktā dṛḍha-vratāḥ prāpta-niṣṭhāḥ santo māṃ bhajante /
GE07bhg4c07u:1249: na caivaṃ puṇya-karmaiva sarva-vidhayoḥ bhakteḥ kāraṇam iti mantavyam /
GE07bhg4c07u:1253: kevala-bhakti-yogasya puṇyādi-karmāśrayaṃ naiva kāraṇam iti bahuśaḥ pratipādanāt //28//
GE07bhg4c07u:1254: baladevaḥ - nanu keṣāṃcit tvad-bhaktiḥ pratīyate sā na syāt /
GE07bhg4c07u:1255: sarva-bhūtāni sarge saṃmohaṃ yāntīty ukter iti cet tatrāha yeṣāṃ prāṇināṃ yādṛcchika-mahattama-dṛṣṭi-pātāt
GE07bhg4c07u:1256: pāpam anta-gataṃ nāśaṃ prāptam abhūt viṣṇor bhūtāni bhūtānāṃ pāvanāya caranti hi
GE07bhg4c07u:1259: puṇyaṃ manojñaṃ karma mahattama-vīkṣaṇa-rūpaṃ yeṣāṃ puṇyaṃ tu cārv api ity amaraḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1260: te dṛḍha-vratā mahat-prasaṅga-prāpta-niṣṭhā dvandva-mohena nirmuktā mat-tattva-jñāḥ santo māṃ bhajante //28//
GE07bhg4c07u:1263: te brahma tad viduḥ kṛtsnam adhyātmaṃ karma cākhilam //29//
GE07bhg4c07u:1264: śrīdharaḥ - evaṃ ca māṃ bhajantaḥ sarvaṃ vijñeyaṃ vijñāya kṛtārthāḥ bhavantīty āha jareti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1265: jarāmaraṇayor mokṣāya nirasanārthaṃ mām āśritya ye prayatante te tat paraṃ brahma viduḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1267: yena tat prāptavyaṃ taṃ dehādi-vyatiriktaṃ śuddham ātmānaṃ ca jānantīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1268: tat-sādhana-bhūtam akhilaṃ sa-rahasyaṃ karma ca jānantīty arthaḥ //29//
GE07bhg4c07u:1269: madhusūdanaḥ - athedānīm arjunasya praśyan utthāpayituṃ sūtra-bhūtau ślokāv ucyete /
GE07bhg4c07u:1270: anayor eva vṛtti-sthānīya uttaro 'dhyāyo bhaviṣyati jareti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1272: tad-eka-hetuṃ māṃ sa-guṇaṃ bhagavantam āśrityetara-sarva-vaimukhyena śaraṇaṃ gatvā
GE07bhg4c07u:1273: yatanti yatante mad-arpitāni phalābhisandhi-śūnyāni vihitāni karmāṇi kurvanti te
GE07bhg4c07u:1274: krameṇa śuddhāntaḥ-karaṇāḥ santas taj-jagat-kāraṇaṃ māyādhiṣṭhānaṃ śuddhaṃ paraṃ
GE07bhg4c07u:1276: karma ca tad-ubhaya-vedana-sādhanaṃ gurūpasadana-śravaṇa-mananaādy-akhilaṃ niravaśeṣṃ phalāvyabhicāri vidur jānantīty arthaḥ //29//
GE07bhg4c07u:1277: viśvanāthaḥ - tad evam ārtādyās trayaḥ sakāmā māṃ bhajantaḥ kṛtārthā bhavantīti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1278: devatāntaraṃ bhajantas tu cyavanta ity uktvā svasyābhajane 'py adhikāriṇaś coktā bhagavatā /
GE07bhg4c07u:1279: idānīm anyaḥ sa-kāmaḥ caturtho 'pi mad-bhakto 'stīty āha jareti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1280: jarāmaraṇayor mokṣāya nāśāya ye yogino yatanti yatante /
GE07bhg4c07u:1282: te taṃ prasiddhaṃ brahma tathā kṛtsnam ātmānaṃ deham adhikṛtya bhoktṛtayā vartamānam
GE07bhg4c07u:1283: adhyātmaṃ jīvātmānam akhilaṃ karma ca nānā-vidha-karma-janyaṃ jīvasya saṃsāraṃ ca
GE07bhg4c07u:1285: baladevaḥ -- tad evam ārtādayaḥ sa-kāmā mad-bhaktāḥ kāmān anubhūyānte māṃ prapadya vindanti mad-anya-deva-bhaktās tu saṃsarantīty uktam /
GE07bhg4c07u:1286: atha tebhyo 'nyo 'pi sa-kāmo mad-bhakto 'stīty ucyate jareti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1287: ye jarā-maraṇābhyāṃ vimokṣāya tan-mātra-kāmāḥ santo mām āśritya mad-arcāṃ sevitvā yatante /
GE07bhg4c07u:1289: te tat prasiddhaṃ brahma kṛtsnaṃ sa-parikaraṃ vidur adhyātmaṃ cākhilaṃ karma ca viduḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1290: brahmādi-śabdānām adhibhūtādi-śabdānāṃ cārthāḥ parasminn adhyāye bhagavataiva vyākhyāsyante /
GE07bhg4c07u:1292: na tu mad-vaśyatā-karīṃ mat-priyatām ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1293: smṛtiś caivam āha sakṛd yad aṅga pratmānta-rahitā mona-mayīṃ bhāgavatīṃ dadau gatim ity ādyā //29//
GE07bhg4c07u:1295: sādhibhūtādhidaivaṃ māṃ sādhiyajñaṃ ca ye viduḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1296: prayāṇa-kāle 'pi ca māṃ te vidur yukta-cetasaḥ //30//
GE07bhg4c07u:1297: śrīdharaḥ - na caivaṃ-bhūtānāṃ yoga-bhraṃśa-śaṅkāpīty āha sādhibhūteti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1299: adhibhūtenādhidaivena ca sahādhiyajñena ca saha māṃ ye jānanti te yukta-cetaso mayy āsakta-manasaḥ prayāṇa-kāle 'pi maraṇa-samaye 'pi māṃ vidur jānanti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1300: na tu tad api vyākulībhūya māṃ vismaranti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1306: madhusūdanaḥ - na caivaṃ-bhūtānāṃ mad-bhaktānāṃ mṛtyu-kāle 'pi vivaśa-karaṇatayā mad-vismaraṇaṃ śaṅkanīyaṃ,
GE07bhg4c07u:1307: yataḥ sādhibhūtādhidaivam adhibhūtādidaivābhyāṃ sahitaṃ tathā sādhiyajñaṃ cādhiyajñena
GE07bhg4c07u:1308: ca sahitaṃ māṃ ye viduś cintayanti te yukta-cetasaḥ sarvadā mayi samāhita-cetasaḥ
GE07bhg4c07u:1309: santas tat-saṃskāra-pāṭavāt prayāṇa-kāle prāṇotkramaṇa-kāle karaṇa-grāmasyātyanta-vyagratāyām api /
GE07bhg4c07u:1310: ca-kārād ayatnenaiva mat-kṛpayā māṃ sarvātmānaṃ vidur jānanti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1311: teṣāṃ mṛti-kāle 'pi mad-ākāraiva citta-vṛttiḥ pūrvopacita-saṃskāra-pāṭavād bhavati /
GE07bhg4c07u:1312: tathā ca te mad-bhakti-yogāt kṛtārthā eveti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c07u:1313: adhibhūtādhidaivādhiyajña-śabdānuttare 'dhyāye 'rjuna-praśna-pūrvakaṃ vyākhyāsyati bhagavān iti sarvam anāvilam /
GE07bhg4c07u:1314: tad atrottamādhikāriṇaṃ prati jñeyaṃ madhyamādhikāriṇaṃ prati ca dhyeyaṃ lakṣaṇayā mukhyayā ca vṛttyā tat-pada-pratipādyaṃ brahma nirūpitam
GE07bhg4c07u:1318: viśvanāthaḥ --- mad-bhakti-prabhāvād yeṣām īdṛśaṃ maj-jñānaṃ syāt teṣām anta-kāle 'pi tad eva jñānaṃ syāt /
GE07bhg4c07u:1319: na tv anyeṣām iva karmopasthāpitā bhāvi-deha-prāpty-anurūpā matir ity āha sādhibhūteti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1321: bhaktā eva hares tattva-vido māyāṃ taranti,
GE07bhg4c07u:1322: te coktāḥ ṣaḍ-vidhā atrety adhyāyārtho nirūpitaḥ //30//
GE07bhg4c07u:1325: baladevaḥ - na ca tat-sevayā prāptaṃ taj-jñānaṃ kadācid api bhraṃśety āha sādhīti /
GE07bhg4c07u:1326: adhibhūtenādhidaivenādhiyajñena ca sahitaṃ māṃ ye viduḥ sat-prasaṅgāj jānanti,
GE07bhg4c07u:1327: te prayāṇa-kāle mṛtyu-samaye 'pi māṃ vidur na tu tad-anyavad vyagrāḥ santo māṃ vismarantīty arthaḥ //30//
GE07bhg4c07u:1328: māṃ vidus tattvato bhaktā man-māyām uttaranti te /
GE07bhg4c07u:1329: te punaḥ pañcadhety eṣa saptamasya vinirṇayaḥ //
